title: Free flowing infinite runner - FLO Game

comments: Uninstalled and reinstalled app because the update made it to where the game was unplayable. Went to login, using Facebook credentials. It says it failed because I would not allow them access to my friends list. Something doesn't seem right about that. Never had a game NOT allow me to login, after denying access to my friends list. Sorry, would prefer you not send messages to all my friends with my name tagged on it.

Fantastic game.I am loving this game. Still there is few problem.Miniclips please solve the issues. After players matching ,game is hacked/stopped by several times.Only way to win that kind of match,any of one player has to quit or network issues.Its waste of time,also harm for devices (battery drainage,high heating). So,admin plz look after these prob.Why it's hanging or hacking.

As football based game it is superb, in terms of gameplay, graphics etc. But the biggest idiotic part of this game is that if freezes like magic. The whole game main screen becomes unresponsive and stays like that no matters the game is restarted or the damn phone is. Get this thing sorted out Miniclip. You have a reputation to maintain or not?

I think this game is a really fun addicting game. The main reason why I got it was because of 8 ball pool. That game is also very fun. The only thing I don't like about football strike is that when I get on sometimes it won't let me click the spinner. So it's like my phone froze. But my phone didn't freeze. It's just the app. So can you guys please fix this.

At first I was skeptical about this game. I had downloaded it and went without playing for a couple of weeks. Then,one day I just happen to open the app and play. Best move I ever made for an app! This game is just flat out addicting, fun and challenging.  I was pleasantly surprised about how much fun it is and that there is, most of the time, something new.  Chalkenign friends and new people always makes for a challenging and fun time waster. Even if I don't have the time to play, I still make time!! Haha

Edit: Got worse because it costs me money & gold and the broken controls are causing losses. Uninstalling.  Defense. It's broken. I just tracked the touches through the debugger and 2 out of 5 times I swipe right up, but the goalie jumps down. Fix that or many people will switch to other games.. I know I will.

descriptionHTML:
You’ve never played a football game like this before. Take on your friends in multiplayer free-kick face-offs, or make a name for yourself in the Career Mode!

Challenge the world across different online game modes! Hit the targets in a fast-paced, time-limited battle for points in Shooting Race mode, or take turns as both striker and goalkeeper in the one-on-one Free Kick mode!

Customise your striker and goalkeeper with tons of unlockable items! Show off your style or represent your team’s colours!

Take on Career mode, travelling through different stadiums around the globe and taking on unique soccer challenges to unlock medals!

With simple, fast gameplay, Football Strike is easy to play and offers endless competitive football fun!

comments: This game keeps crashing to the home screen without warning,same problem with Blossom blast saga.Problem started before few days ago,since I updated both games.This problem keeps happening with android kitkat. Can this problem be solved or should I deinstall all king games I have? I have no problem with games from other developers, so this is on you, not on me.

Have played this game virtually since it first started it's a great game but why do we haveto buy the gold bars we have earned throughout the games I have never spent a cent buying anything! Shouldn't most of the gold bars be awarded to us for being loyal gamers ☺

Awesome game, one of my favourites. Only suggestion would be that the bonus hours of unlimited lives could be gameplay hours, not actual time hours as it is sometimes impossible to continue playing depending on when you are awarded the bonus but on the plus side there are many opportunities to get bonus hours or recharges, much more than many other games.

Fun & super adorable match 3 game - the only game I've kept playing for years (3-4?!) Variety of different mechanics and choice of animal helpers keep it interesting, and less frustrating than the Candy Crush games. Then again, maybe it's just because everything is so darn cute! So nice to see the New Zealand birds/animals in there too, go kiwi! :)

Since today I've started getting in game app adverts...  Terrible considering it only says in app purchases. What a joke a bit like the stupid pig you gave us for gold bars which you made out to be free but no... Of course you have to purchase so why put that rubbish in the game! If I wanted to check if I have PPI I'd wait for a cold caller, not an in game advert! You take the living p*ss!
Payments for bricks does not respond with google play . Just says error occurred try later or wrong password. Im already logged in google play atc. I did not make any changes in my account.
description: Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 2 Saga! Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Will you join forces with the Farm Heroes and help to collect the Cropsies and save the day?  Play through hundreds of levels of switching and matching farming fun to find out!Take on this fantastic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! Farm Heroes Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/termsFarm Heroes Saga features: ● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club ● Rechargable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels● Easy to play but challenging to master● Acres of luscious levels to complete - more added every 2 weeks!● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!● Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the InternetVisit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!Follow us to get news and updates:facebook.com/FarmHeroes Twitter @FarmHeroesSaga youtube.com/user/FarmHeroesOfficial farmheroessaga.com Have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!
descriptionHTML:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 2 Saga! 

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Will you join forces with the Farm Heroes and help to collect the Cropsies and save the day? Play through hundreds of levels of switching and matching farming fun to find out!
Take on this fantastic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Farm Heroes Saga features:

comments: Please add more cars and make the graphics more realistic, and make the sounds of the cars realistic, unique, and smooth. Make each car have its own sound, the sounds they're supposed to have. Add the car stats and add a nitro feature. Add the brand each car is supposed to have. Make the cars spit fire!. Add weather conditions like rain, thunderstorm, lightning, and windy. Please add cars like: Ferrari F50 GT, W Motors Lykan Hypersport, Ferrari FXX Evoluzione, Hennessey Venom GT, Bugatti Chiron, Ferrari FXX K, McLaren P1, Dodge Challenger SRT, Chevrolet Camaro SS, Lamborghini Aventador LP700-4, Lamborghini Veneno, Chevrolet Corvette Z06 C7r, Ferrari 458 Italia, McLaren F1 GTR, even the Devel Sixteen Prototype. Please add these cars on the next update!. If you can, add them in packs!

I can't say I love it,maybe I can. But any way, this would have to be in one of top hundred games😀. There are a few things I would like added though. Maybe add a driver cause that make it more realistic and maybe a few new cars  and definitely some people walking around doing random stuff. And maybe fix the sensitivity unless I missed that. So yeah really enjoyed this😀😁😀😁😀😁.

I think you guys have messed up your game in the past few updates. Seems like there is some memory leak or something. After a while the steering wheel lags so much. Only the input. Graphics don't lag at all. Please fix. Also would be great if you could add some button to start and stop a timer in free mode so we can set time challenges for ourselves. I like the game but it is unplayable after a few minutes after the recent updates

This has to be like, my 5th or 6th reinstallment of this game since there's no ingame reset, but darn well worth the data(little bytes). I usually like more realistic car games, but even the "extreme" warp in physics in the gameplay doesn't distract from the fun. These are the cars you'd want if you're trying to beat the traffic, run from the cops, or solve a parking dillemma. Great fun time killer! One thing though, the other reviewers are correct in their complaints about how often and when ads pop up. That shouldn't happen smack dab in the middle of a maneuver.

This is crazy like I understand that you need ads but the fact that they are popping up on the middle of the screen is crazy! Like I woodnt mind if you had a small one at the bottom is the screen but the fact it pops up at random in the screen is really annoying and finds the game. I do love this game but the ads ruin it. Please fix this!

What you should improve is that YOU NEED TO REMOVE THE ADD's I MEAN SERIOUSLY I WATCH MORE ADDS THAN THE GAMEPLAY. I ONLY PLAY FOR A LITTLE THEN MOST OF ADDS SHOW UP. I WQ5CH ADDS THAN PLAY8NG THE GAME FOR CRYING OT LOUD!!

comments: Only been playing for a short time but so far it seems very enjoyable. At the moment I can play for free and seem to be progressing. I have noticed a few ridiculously hard levels. I'm not going to pay to win so I had to spend a while building health potions which gets repetitive. Apart from that it's fun over all.

This game is just about money with no reward. Gets boring after a month and even through my power is over 3100 i can't beat 2800 power quests....Ummhmm....seems I do the exact damage I did when I started...mechanics are messed up..and no purpose

Very good game and a great time killer. It can take some time to get your team up to strength to fight certain levels. They have spoiled the game slightly with the all new alliance wars  that some people didn't want. It's impossible to find items to ascend your hero's to the next level to make them stronger. Also to level up troops it costs a lot of in game food to level them up. You need a lot of patience to play this game. If not then don't download. I wish I hadn't now.

I've been playing this game for sorry one year now and I do like it but it has a few flaws.  It takes a very long time to level up heroes, it's very hard to get good heroes because it's just by chance, and you don't get very many gems at a time if you want to get anywhere in this game you have to spend money.  Now they have a VIP 4.99 for a month you get 30 gems a day, and extra regular summon, and instead of just be able to upgrade one building at a time you can do two at a time.  It really is helping me get all my buildings to the same level. There is also alliance wars now and they also have challenges.  With a few tweaks I would give this game 5 stars hands down.  I definitely recommend it.

Great if you buy your way through the game. The fun lasts a few hours and then it's an endless grind of frustration. You won't get any better characters unless you purchase them with microtransactions and will lose....... A LOT.  Greed wins and the sheep that can throw their money at a mobile game will triumph.

Feels like there's too much going on at once with the base and everything, and it eats up an ungodly amount of battery... But it's a cool game! Match 3 with strategy RPG assets. The strongest point is definitely the art.

comments: Absolutely love all of the geometry dash games! Colors and graphics are awesome, game play is challenging but fun, and the music is perfect! Only thing I can complain about is that I wish all of the levels from these free versions were in the full version. I own the full version and would much prefer to be able to play these levels without ads and with all of the cool characters and colors I have unlocked. Other than that though, amazing work you guys, keep it up!

Woah. WOAH. WWOOAAHH!!! Oh. Another Chllenging game but thhe only thing i like in it tha it has Dantdm's Old Intro at the press start! Wow. I am pro at Geometry Dash Games and another one oh yea and there is Sub Zero(MK) name there like i saw them quickly. And i would say for the creator: plz. Creator keep the good work! Ok!!! And make more Geometry Dash and can u make something more fun for more people to play with!!!

Oh my god... This is the best geometry dash free game I have ever played,  and is almost more fun than the full version.  Robtop, you have regained full respect after what happened with meltdown. I'm just speechless, at the amount of work that was put into these three levels, going from the camera angles to the animations. This game is not like meltdown,  which is three short amateur levels, but with three long, harder levels. This game is like a preview to 2.2, and I know it's going to be good.  We'll done, Robtop! Keep up the great work!

This just blows my mind... one thing I would like to see in the future is some rob-top made tutorials on how each editing items works in the game so other players can feel more comfortable making their own levels and not be intimidated by all the other fan made levels... I am one of those players who is intimidated by the other fan made levels... This could help young and creative minds to create their own levels their friends can enjoy. Thanks 10/10

I love this game so much.  Some of the effects and colours added into the game make it so fun to play and watch. Its challenging and thats what makes it fun. Its not like one of those games that are so easy you finish it in an hour. This game takes time and effort. Also the backround music is pretty cool. Especially nock em with headphones. controls are very easy to use, just tap to jump and usually hold to use the vehicles, so easy! This game is perfect and absolutely fun. I would highly recommend downloading geometry dash subzero.

I've been playing this game since the last lvl was ToE. First time when i was surprised was an update with three or four new maps, also demon levels, but that was actually nothing, i felt at this moment ''Wow, update, ok''. I got more admired by new update with this walking thing, still dunno the name, but things they have added, i still love it. Animated trails, new wallpapers that was awesome. New updates have arrived in mini-games for free, also awesome, but now i guess they have no idea what to add, because what they've done this is the biggest and greatest update. I love this game so much, so i can't just put 4 or less. Gg RobTop, Gg.

comments: Tell us what u think and what you can do for me and I will get back to you ASAP. Beast is a game of football and it is a game of football and it is not possible for the game to be played with the players in the game.  Good game controls are set up for the game to play at a different location in Liverpool and Wales and the club has won the championship.

I absolutely loved the game, enough so to even pay for no ads, but it got rid of my highscore, all my hats and outfits, all of my upgrades, and just started fresh. Now I have ads again and I can't get rid of them even though I payed to have them removed. I feel ripped off. Edit: just lost my progress for a second time

It's a pretty solid game the only thing worth mentioning is if you could imply that when you win a shirt that you actually have to pay for it. After a level when it pops up it seems free and I wasted 400 coins on shirts accidentally. Other than that its pretty good

Great game, ads can be blocked without a connection to the internet, but if you're on a streak or attempting a challenge, using one for a continue is nice. I'm honestly addicted, shooting my little comrads to safety.

This game does not have a casual mode so every time you play its time sensitive. This greatly reduced playability. Coupled with the most jerky aiming I have ever used brought this game down to a solid 2⭐.

I truly enjoyed this game. I have been playing frequently for about two weeks. I loaded the game to continue farming for stars to see everything has been wiped as if I just freshly installed it. Seems I'm not the only one this has happened to. Developer: restore what other individuals and I have bought and achieved please. Very unhappy
description: Tired of always losing at Hangman?Now it's time to get back at that noose-wielding bully!Gibbets: Bow Master, the sequel to the smash hit, gives you a chance to save the hangman's victims before they run out of breath! A truly innovative arcade puzzler where you'll have to aim your bow and arrow carefully to cut the hangman's rope without hurting his victims! Use all manner of bonuses and pick ups, warps and teleports, to help you on your quest. Can you handle the frantic pace and save the innocent before they take their final breath?

comments: Not happy! I'm up to level 1521 and for some reason it's taken me back to level 1. What is going on? I've been playing for about a year and NOT happy I'm back to level 1 again. This has now happened to me 3 times where I have been at maximum levels into the legends arena and BOOM! All my levels are gone all my boosters  - which I have paid hundreds of dollars buying are gone. Support do not respond to my repeated requests to resolve this. Very disappointed I've been playing this for almost 2 years.

Just kidding,on it being a baseball game. Great game,but it will begin Cheating me when I get to  Level 160,around there. If I get 5 blues it will only give me credit for 3 or 4 blues. In this way I will not win until the game decides to let me win.

I want to play what the ads showed - matching the tiles and clearing the board. Mindless entertainment, not strategy. Not getting toys to the bottom or clearing bubbles/Legos. If not for the Infinite lives this weekend, I would have Un-installwd the game.

There wasn't a 2.5 choice. The game as with all are selling addiction. I've been playing 10 months in spare moments, 80 more  levels I'm done, not a penny lost. Though by level 50 you'll figure out that random is anything but your next move. Have fun.

I would give this more stars but noe my lives are disappearing before i can use them. 2 or 3 times now i accept my 2 hearts from my friends and use 1 thwn after losing the 1 try i get told im out of lives when i should have 1 more! Can you fix this glitch? Im tired of my lives being ripped off.

This is a strategy game,. Much like chess one must plan their moves in advance, keeps your brain sharp. Addictive and challenging, fun an rewarding. Play in the Star Tournament to earn coins and power boosts....takes no money to have fun.
description: THE ULTIMATE MATCHING PUZZLE GAME WITH UNIQUE MAGIC POWERS AND BOOSTS!♥ Join the fun world of Amy and help collect her precious toys! ♥ Match two or more blocks of the same color to clear the level and collect the toys from where they stuck. But be careful! It is not that easy to save all the toys while your moves are limited! Your talent in solving puzzles will be your best tool while playing this super addictive game. Bust the blocks and enjoy this colorful adventure! Discover Amy’s world to make her smile. Play with the sweetest toys that will drag you to Amy’s enjoyable world. descriptionHTML:

description: This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!>How to play?Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.>Highlights:Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
descriptionHTML:
This is the most interesting block game you have ever held in your hands!
It gets all the charm of the puzzle game: simple, fun, attractive and suitable to everybody.
It is also the funniest way to train your brain and keep your mind sharp!

>How to play?
Place the pieces into board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces.
Game will be over if there are no space for any the given blocks below the board.

>Highlights:
Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
A ranking system has also been added to challenge your friends, colleagues and circles.
You can enjoy this brain game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
summary: Amazing block game with a simple rule.
title: Puzzle Game

comments: I used to love this game. But now all it has become is an ATM for the developer. Every good car in the game must be bought. Winning special events costs money. In game rewards have become useless. There are plenty of other racing games out there that won't require you to refinance your house to play. If I could give it zero stars I would.

Sound could use tweaking, I've driven some of the t1 and t2 cars and they do not sound like that. The grind is real in this game but the developer adds events on a frequent basis to over shadow this. Which would be great if the events didn't expect you to either have the devils luck with silver key crates or a never ending supply of cash.   Over all, great game. I still enjoy playing it even when I hit a "pay wall" and that says something about the game. I've only put $5 into this game (bought a $4.99 special pack) and I've still made it pretty far.

This is by far the greatest racing game I've played on a mobile device! The graphics are amazing, the controls are solid, and it keeps me coming back for more. The only issue I've found with it so far is the live races. Its sometimes hard to find a race and the races themselves seem unfair at times. Other than that, its a great game! Highly recommended!

Other than a gas glitch, I play this all the time. Takes some time to get the right parts for your cars. So if you can just race and collect money until you get a car with all 6 red parts, it's quick entertainment. You have to buy "super nitrous" to beat the leader in a race for his car...which sucks. There should be someway to get super nitrous in the game without buying with real money.

Awesome game and graphics, but pretty much have to spend money if you wanna compete. Should have more races available a t all times. Need to make ALL cars accessible to purchase, with preferably money earned in the game and not $20 of real money or depend on luck to get a good car in "rare imports". Especially, when available races are so limited, supply races, etc., unless you're satisfied with just regulation races.

The game is good, but the "race a boss for their car" is definitely a con. You beat them with ease, then re-race for their car and suddenly they can run like 3 seconds quicker? Do me a favour...  It would be better if after each race you went back to the map rather than the garage. Going back to the garage is seriously annoying.  It would be good if we could have some sort of crew v crew event. Say, 10 racers from each crew pick a car and set a time. Then you get matched up with an opponent and you have to beat their times. Then it's most overall wins or something for crew points?
description: CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGONSetting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!REAL-TIME RACING• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.CAR CUSTOMISATION• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:• Ferrari• McLaren• Bugatti• Lamborghini• Pagani• KoenigseggCHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.DOMINATE THE CITY• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!---------------------Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy
descriptionHTML:
CSR Racing 2 – The next chapter to the #1 drag racing series of all time has arrived!

“Unbelievably good looking”, KOTAKU
“So real it hurts”, CULT OF MAC
“Obliterates the line between console and mobile graphics”, POLYGON

Setting a new standard in visuals, CSR2 delivers hyper-real drag racing to the palm of your hand. Compete against live players across the world with your custom built supercars including LaFerrari, McLaren P1™, Koenigsegg One:1 and many more.

Team up with friends to form a crew, tune your rides for maximum speed and dominate the competition in global crew events. CSR2 is all-new; download for free and start racing now!

3D NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS
• CSR2 redefines what you thought possible on mobile, with stunning detail on all your favorite cars.
• Meticulous level of detail inside every car, incl. original manufacturers’ trim options. Racing doesn’t get more real than this!

REAL-TIME RACING
• Race towards a new challenge! Compete against opponents from around the world or race against friends in real-time challenges.

CAR CUSTOMISATION
• Cars can be customized with a wide range of paint, rims, brake calipers and interior trims just like a real car.
• Personalize your car with paint wraps, decals and custom license plates!

UPGRADE, TUNE AND FUSE
• Car upgrades are only the start. You can now get under the hood to tune gear ratios, tire pressure, nitrous boost settings and much more.
• Stay competitive by stripping surplus cars for parts, and fuse them into your favorite vehicles.

BUILD YOUR DREAM GARAGE
• Collect beautiful supercars and show them off in your huge warehouse garage.
• CSR2 features over 200 officially licensed vehicles from the world’s most desirable car manufacturers including:
• Ferrari
• McLaren
• Bugatti
• Lamborghini
• Pagani
• Koenigsegg

CHALLENGE FRIENDS AND RACING ENTHUSIASTS AROUND THE WORLD
• Prove your skill in fast-paced, synchronous multiplayer challenges. Master the unique timing of each car to come out on top.
• Chat with other players live, and join a crew to roll with your friends.
• Compete in fresh and exciting online events and increase your rank on the PVP leaderboards.

DOMINATE THE CITY
• Compete in single-player Crew Battles across stunning race environments.
• Work your way from rookie to pro by defeating the top crews in a city where nothing is as it seems. Can you uncover the truth?
• Keep an eye out for events to earn extra cash for upgrades and win rare parts for your rides. New events added daily!


---------------------

Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE! Must be 13+ to play. CSR Racing 2 is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

To prevent unauthorized purchases, select “Set or Change PIN” from the Google Play settings menu, create a PIN, then enable the “Use PIN for Purchases” option. You will then be required to enter your PIN before every transaction.

Terms of Service: https://www.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service
Privacy Policy: https://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy

Since it was sold to a new owner they no longer answer anyone's questions. They send you to a link that has everyone else scrambling for answers. They also do not replace items you lose when the game has problems. They do not care if you purchased them. The old company use to replace items and gold bars when it was the games glitches. They actually cared about the people playing it. The owners now can not even be bothered to reply. If you play it only get the free stuff. Do not waste your hard earned money on this game. descriptionHTML:
Start playing Candy Crush Soda Saga today - already enjoyed by millions of players around the world!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is the divine puzzle game from King, the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Farm Heroes Saga and more! Switch and match candies to create 3 in a row, or match 4 (or more) to make delicious special candies! Complete the goals before you run out of moves to progress through deliciously fun levels. It's that simple!

Switch and match scrumptious candies to make mouth-watering combinations and play challenging game modes brimming with purple soda and Candy Bears! Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Candy Crush Soda Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

New Candy Crush Soda Saga features: 

* Over 1000 Sodalicious levels
* New Game Modes include:
Soda – switch bottles and candies to release purple soda and save the Candy Bears
Frosting – match candies to smash the ice and set the Candy Bears free
Honey – match candies next to the honey to release the trapped Candy Bears
* Scrumptious new candies and sublime new combinations:
Match 4 candies in a square to make a Swedish Fish
Match 7 candies to create the remarkable Coloring Candy
* Explore juicy new environments and meet the kookiest characters
* Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy Crush never looked so tasty
* Easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master
* For players that Facebook Connect, there are leaderboards for you and your friends to compare your Sodalicious scores
* Easily sync the game between mobile and tablet devices and unlock the full game features when connected to the internet

This mouth-watering puzzle adventure will instantly quench your thirst for fun. Join Kimmy on her juicy journey to find Tiffi, by switching and matching your way through new dimensions of magical gameplay. Take on this Sodalicious Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Are you already a fan of the new Candy Crush Soda Saga?  If so then visit our website, like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

comments: This game could use better and easier ways to earn money for opening the chests and scoring or pay outs after each prize or game. So you can get better equipment and achievements. Would help keep players more interested. My only dislikes so far. I most definitely enjoy the game and think it's pretty awesome!

Great game. It is easy to use but still challenging. The controls are smooth and consistent and there are plenty of things you can purchase but don't have to to enjoy the game. Only reasons for losing a star is no way to play alone or practice, it has to be against someone. Also, there is not a way as far as I can find, to turn off notifications. Lastly, it does use battery pretty fast. Is is not a "battery killer", but does drain it faster than other games. However it probably does take a bit of power for all this game does.

Excellent game against real people who reply to you if you click one of the comments (for those who say it's a computer we play against). My only problem with it is there should be an option to buy gems with coins rather than have to always pay real cash for gems. If it had this option I'd give 5 stars!

Was fun at first, then massive losing streak due to other players making every single shot perfect.  But most of the time when I start spending money I do better.  Odd.  I think I found a cheater during a putt.  He lined up correctly, however with the power he should have missed the hole.  I tried to watch the replay, but it is the only replay unavailable.  Then when we do the tie breaker shootout, he hits with pinpoint accuracy on the edge of the rough/fairway to get within 2 ft of the hole.

Good gameplay, but the matchmaking is not the best. Have been playing for a week, and I'm rarely matched with someone that is at my level. Opponent almost always seems to be higher with much more leveled clubs.  Update: Have kept track of the last 100 games. I had more experience and better overall clubs in 17 of them... Please match against experience, NOT trophies.

After playing for a while it just isn't that great.  It shows too much of what other people are doing and then makes you go first.  Which is the opposite of competitive. I've now tried for a few months but honestly it's designed to make you spend cash.  I still play a little but constantly think about uninstalling it.  It gives you a free golden tee shot maybe once a week.  The rewards are meh... Because you know if you won too much you wouldn't need to spend real cash.  For the amount of rewards you get it should play the free golden tee shot 3 times a week.  The best feature is that you can save a shot and upload to YouTube easily.

comments: This is the best survival game on the play store, there just some things that needs to be add. 1. The ability to kill the shark and wait for another to to show up 2. To be able to rotate objects 3. To be able to go on land and loot the the island on foot 4. To be able to chopcdown trees while on the island 5. Use rocks to make walls for boat 6. Able to create log holders and as well a add sticks 7. Add things to craft a marksman pistol 8. Add decorations(like tables, chairs, chandeliers, etc. 9. Add more weapon builds(like bows and arrows) 10. More see animals That's my top 10 list of what I think should be added, this game is amazing and it kind of reminds me of a mobile version of The Forest for PC.
It's very fun at the beginning but then when realized I can't physically walk on the islands I was disappointed then it gets boring
This is a great game, well built, keep it up guys, you got this far, lets go further,
Been playing for a few weeks now and need coal/charcol im only getting ore .......and cant use the furnace
Amazimg
Fantastic

descriptionHTML:
Discover! Create! Survive!
Your home is an endless ocean. Your neighbors – ruthless sharks, sea creatures and relentless nature. The only refuge is a raft. Improve it, craft everything you need to escape from the ocean trap, survive by all means!

🐋 Our survival on the raft advantages:

🌎 Real-life survival simulator
Check your health, hunger and thirst indicators, struggle sharks attacks. Meet the challenges and try to survive, it’s all up to you!

⚓ Resources hunting
Use a hook and catch necessary resources: wreckage, chests and barrels from the ocean. They will help you to survive!

🔨 Build and upgrade your raft
Expand, develop and protect your raft. If you need more place, build a first floor!

📜 Lot’s of crafting recipes
Fish, cook and collect drinking water. Craft building materials, clothes, weapons, chests and other necessary things to survive!

🚣 Solve the puzzle of an endless ocean
What happened in this apocalyptic world? Why are people destined to live in the ocean. Training and quest system help you to find answers and escape.

🌗 Great plans
We carefully examine all proposals according our favorite game improving. We’ll add dynamic Day-Night Cycle and weather condition, exciting plot, underwater world and other interesting events in the future updates!

Find out more advantages of the app:

🌊 VARIABLE WORLDS OF RAFT SURVIVAL
Each of survival adventure games has its own world with unique difficulties and challenges. Our survivor simulator generates unlimited numbers of worlds. Explore Pacific islands, reefs, and bottomless ocean trenches in raft games free!
No two worlds are alike: you can generate completely new and randomized world at any time in the survival free.

🌊 CLOSE TO REAL-LIFE EXPERIENCE
Raft survival free is a 3D game designed to give survival games free lovers the closest to real life gameplay. That’s why Day-Night Cycle was added. Survivor app has treacherous weather conditions that allow to enjoy sunny days and beware of stormy ones. If you’d like to get new skills in survive games, try raft games!

🌊 YOUR LIFE IS IN YOUR HANDS
Raft building games offer the chance to craft new weapons and equipments. Search for shipwreck parts and improve your raft in survival escape. Craft a spear and protect yourself from murderous sharks that follow you everywhere.

Bearing in mind all these qualities of build and survive games, you’d not forget about your health status in the harsh conditions. Fishing and hunting is the only way to succeed and not to starve to death in raft survival in the ocean.

RAFT: Original Survival Game features:
• 3D interface of raft free
• Realistic experience of survival base building games
• Complex and amazing challenges of survivor games free

Let your brain work at high speed and do everything within your power to win in one of the survival apps! If you want to go on raft craft survival games and turn it into an adventure of a lifetime, then play RAFT: Original Survival Game.

Join our social networking site and take part in expecting updates discussions and offer your ideas to improve the game!
Make screenshots, record videos, share your achievements with other players!

comments: I absolutely love this game. The music is good, the challenges are really fun and... well, challenging. It has taken me several days of being asked by the game if I would like to review it because I was having so much fun and didn't want to stop playing long enough to review. But here you have it. This game is well deserving of a great review. I'm going to go back to the game now so I can keep on rushing.

Awesome game I had ever played in my life... although I'm 20 just..😉😉 I just loved the game.today 21/02/2018 I installed it on my phone.within 1 hr I played 100+ times. Till now my highest score is 74 & I'm in challenge 25. Really loved this game very much. I recommend this game to my each & every friend...(even my enemy also...😂😂 Just kidding) I wished that I will cross 1000+ score on future.  Loved this game. Lots of Love to this game & ketchapp. 😘😘😘❤️❤️❤️

A simple, addictive yet hard and raging game. I love how you can customize your spheres and roads--and to turn off the ads just turn off your WiFi or data. Honestly, after 250 it gets a little impossible to play lol. Keep up the good work, Ketchapp!

Another great game from ketchapp. A very unique idea, executed well and with nice graphics. It is simple yet difficult, a good combination. I gave it 4 stars however, as sometimes the game takes a while to respond to my touch, and often doesn't respond at all. My phone is quite slow though, so I'm willing to give the game the benefit of the doubt.

Enjoyed, On a overall basis i really enjoyed the game. And i also finished all the 100 challenges within a time of 5 days, as the game is really captivating i kept on continuously playing it. But now i am kind of bored from it as there's nothing to do after i have completed the 100 challenges. If there is an addition of another 100 more challenges that would make the game more fun to play and i would enjoy it thoroughly. Also i am not sure how will i earn the other spehers and roads without any challenges, so if anyone can help me how in figuring that out it would be really nice. At the end the game is really good. Cheers to the creaters.

I've noticed that when I get higher in the challenges the ones involving lane switching glitch out and never let me complete it. I have counted and I don't think it is possible for me to have counted incorrectly 20+ times repeatedly. Also now whenever I boot up the game it has the beginner tutorial pop-up telling you what to do which is annoying.

description: The addictive mega-hit Temple Run is now out for Android! All your friends are playing it - can you beat their high scores?!You've stolen the cursed idol from the temple, and now you have to run for your life to escape the Evil Demon Monkeys nipping at your heels. Test your reflexes as you race down ancient temple walls and along sheer cliffs. Swipe to turn, jump and slide to avoid obstacles, collect coins and buy power ups, unlock new characters, and see how far you can run! "In every treasure hunting adventure movie there’s one scene in which the plucky hero finally gets his hands on the treasure but then has to navigate a maze of booby traps in order to get out alive. Temple Run is this scene and nothing else. And it’s amazing." - SlideToPlay.comREVIEWS★ "Most thrilling and fun running game in a while, possibly ever." - TheAppera.com★ "A fast and frenzied experience." - IGN.com★ "Very addicting… definitely a very different running game." - Appolicious.com★ Voted by TouchArcade Forums as Game of the Week★ One of TouchArcade's Best Games of the Month★ Over 50 MILLION players worldwide!

comments: Wayyyyyy 2 many ads. I played 2 games back to back and there was 22 ads. R u freakin kidding me. How can you expect people to give you 5 *s knowing this app is clear full of ads after ads. I would of given this a 5 if I could enjoy the game without all the ad interruptions.

I really love playing skipbo but now the ads are getting to be outrageous. Not only are the ads after every turn you make but now they freeze constantly and I have to shut down and restart it. I would buy the 2$ but that still has ads too; so what's even the point... so dissapointed.

I get that ads should be used to support a free app.. But this game is unplayable due to every ad they insert. Literally after every action is another 30 sec ad. You can't even play the main game because they kill you with ads. Uninstalling.

So many ads they interfere with gameplay! What should be a quick turn becomes a 3 minute play. I don't ads, I support developers making money and even click on ads for bonuses, but this is ridiculous. The game is also laggy, which I suspect if from the ads trying to load. Expect game crashes as well - one occurs every gameplay for me.
Too many ads to the point it's unenjoyable. But other then that the game itself is fun and easy to play. But seriously a 30 second video (that may or may not freeze) every 2-3 turns is ridiculous.
This game would be ALOT better without all the ads every 2 minutes. I had ads popping up after my turn would be up! Really thinking about deleting the game!

comments: Overall, game quality is pretty solid. Few graphic glitches here and there but can be expected. It would be nice to rotate to see a better perspective and easier to hit.   One must improvement needed is that when you play a bot, it's way too noticable. You need to improve the bot intelligence! I understand why bots would be needed time to time.  Coins could be cheaper too.

This game would be awesome if it matched you with people equal to your level but it doesn't. So I spend more time trying to get to the higher levels and not able to upgrade equipment. Of course you could always purchase money but I'm not big on doibg that!

This is overall the best golf game I have come across or any app, in general, relating to sports. My only problem is that sometimes people do not want to, not do not have the ability to create a facebook account. I wish there would be a way to play with your family; without the facebook account users perks.

Main screen isn't immediately obvious what does what. Also a bit annoying that my level changed and I didn't see the wager increased so i was quickly running out of coins until I realised I could step down again. Good game so far though.

I used to think it was a Pretty decent game. But it keeps stealing money. I had $21,000, and went to play a game for $20,000, and it lost connection for a dang second and zap went my coins!  This is the first time its happened with the large coins, but its happened several times with the $1,600

Needs more obstacles on lower levels. Noticed good players staying in lower levels because there isn't any competition. Clubs are better than a beginner wich makes sense but higher levels should only be limited to a certain amount at a lower level. Over all I love it though

description: The City police force has set up a new HQ in the mountains. Test out their new vehicles and catch crooks with the Net Shooter!BE A CREATIVE LEGO® CITY HERO!LEGO® City is a creative mission-based game for brave 6-8-year-old everyday heroes. Build cool vehicles to put out fires, construct buildings, save minifigures in distress at sea, chase crooks across the City, explore the mysteries of the jungle or the dangerous volcanic excavation site!DEVELOP SKILLS THROUGH PLAYYoung LEGO City heroes can experiment with the basics of physics and practice their fine motor skills while dodging obstacles, reaching goals, and saving the day in a thrilling race against the clock!FEATURES • BUILD ICONIC VEHICLES: Players can build their own versions of LEGO City vehicles including fire trucks, police cars, construction vehicles, helicopters, coastguard boats, jungle ATVs, and many more.• BUILD A WHOLE CITY: Watch the City grow with every completed heroic mission.• ENGAGING ENVIRONMENTS: Every area in LEGO City needs a hero: The city centre, the jungle, the volcano, even the sky and the sea! • RACE AGAINST TIME: A real hero can keep cool under pressure – each mission must be completed before the clock runs out!• ENDLESS BUILDING COMBINATIONS: Combine vehicle parts to create your own super-vehicles!• AGE-APPROPRIATE: Intuitive navigation and lots of LEGO City humour!• SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.WHY PLAY WITH LEGO CITY?Nothing beats real-life heroes! LEGO City honours the creative problem-solvers who see opportunities in life when others see obstacles, who dare break things down to rebuild them into something even better, who can keep their cool in the face of danger, and who take the time to eat a hot dog and drink hot chocolate once in a while, too. Because that’s when all the best ideas happen!For app support contact LEGO Consumer Service. For contact details refer to http://service.lego.com/contactus Our privacy policy and terms of use for apps are accepted if you download this app. Read more on http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/Privacy-Policy and http://aboutus.lego.com/legal-notice/terms-of-use-for-apps LEGO and the LEGO logo are trademarks of the LEGO Group. ©2018 The LEGO Group.
descriptionHTML:
The City police force has set up a new HQ in the mountains. Test out their new vehicles and catch crooks with the Net Shooter!

BE A CREATIVE LEGO® CITY HERO!
LEGO® City is a creative mission-based game for brave 6-8-year-old everyday heroes. Build cool vehicles to put out fires, construct buildings, save minifigures in distress at sea, chase crooks across the City, explore the mysteries of the jungle or the dangerous volcanic excavation site!

DEVELOP SKILLS THROUGH PLAY
Young LEGO City heroes can experiment with the basics of physics and practice their fine motor skills while dodging obstacles, reaching goals, and saving the day in a thrilling race against the clock!

FEATURES
• BUILD ICONIC VEHICLES: Players can build their own versions of LEGO City vehicles including fire trucks, police cars, construction vehicles, helicopters, coastguard boats, jungle ATVs, and many more.
• BUILD A WHOLE CITY: Watch the City grow with every completed heroic mission.
• ENGAGING ENVIRONMENTS: Every area in LEGO City needs a hero: The city centre, the jungle, the volcano, even the sky and the sea!
• RACE AGAINST TIME: A real hero can keep cool under pressure – each mission must be completed before the clock runs out!
• ENDLESS BUILDING COMBINATIONS: Combine vehicle parts to create your own super-vehicles!
• AGE-APPROPRIATE: Intuitive navigation and lots of LEGO City humour!
• SAFETY FIRST: Your child will play in a safe, closed environment, with NO third-party advertising, links to external websites, in-app purchases or hidden data collection. LEGO marketing content and information is served, for instance LEGO news about LEGO sets and other LEGO games, in hope of inspiring children’s creative play.

WHY PLAY WITH LEGO CITY?
Nothing beats real-life heroes! LEGO City honours the creative problem-solvers who see opportunities in life when others see obstacles, who dare break things down to rebuild them into something even better, who can keep their cool in the face of danger, and who take the time to eat a hot dog and drink hot chocolate once in a while, too. Because that’s when all the best ideas happen!

description: Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech? Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.comFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
descriptionHTML:
Last Battleground: Survival is a survival shooter game. Each match takes 40 players and puts them on a deserted island. At the start of the game, all players parachute onto the island completely empty-handed.

The way the game unfolds is: players are spread around the island unarmed and must find and use various weapons and items to eliminate opponents.

As time goes on, the island's "safe zone" gets smaller and smaller, and certain areas will also be bombarded. Players and teams will be ranked for the match in the order they are eliminated.

The safe zone changes randomly in each match, providing players with a fresher, more intense experience each time.
Remember, find a weapon and supplies as quickly as you can and then move to the island’s safe zone.

This is not just a game, this is battle for survival!!!

PLEASE NOTE! Last Battleground: Survival is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 12 years of age to play or download Last Battleground: Survival.

Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: LastBattleground.help@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LastBattleground/
developerAddress: Unit 04,7/F,Bright Way Tower, No.33 Mong Kok Road, Kowloon, Hong Kong

All the time game crashes and stalls, Samsung galaxy S7 was locked several times. Game is developed for crazy profit  and normally you should pay to have fun  otherwise some one will but not you.

The game seems to go through faze's some times good some times just ok. If you only speak english it can be very taxing, not to friendly at times. Has a very clicky higher archery . If you fall out with them you can have wasted all the money you put into the game.

The translator needs fixing,  it's ok but could be a lot better,diamonds keep vanishing and there are other issues in game I don't like, it seems some legiins have preferential treatment regarding tasks and rewards. Other issues with the chat keyboard freezing or not working properly.

As always the same issues constantly highlighted by many users bugs, game kickouts, freezing. These issues have been brought to attention by many but the usual response by speak to movga directly look at all the other bad feedback given they Don't want to put off potential new people. Is Waste money try a different game nothing ever gets sorted and if they do it doesn't last long and same issues arise.

Game would be better if was based on skills rather than how much money you can spend on it. They should remove prosperity as it is abused before legion battles or regional battles. The players with the deepest pockets win no skills required... I love the game but the model is wrong.
description: Fleet Command is a naval warfare strategy game based on real life ships and military ranks, providing players a captivating experience of naval wars. Strengthen your power by managing and developing your base, producing resources, building ships, recruiting officers and more. Set sail to discover the vast riches of the sea in the world map. Mine resources, battle pirates and wage war against other players. Establish a Legion and lead your fellow players to glory in battle. With so many aspects to the game there is more to it than raw power, the right combination of officers, equipment and strategy can overcome a more powerful enemy.The game is very easy to start with and includes a tutorial of the basics, so even players with no experience of RTS or war games will learn very quickly. New functions and equipment are unlocked as your commander level increases, allowing players to learn the game at their own pace. With a vast support network, players can learn the more advanced features of the game and truly understand which path to take to victory.Features:Several ship classes of different types, all based on real life ships of the past and present ready for you to build or collect and command. Battle effects include explosions and missile trajectory so you can watch your fleet defeat your enemies.Flexible formations allowing you to choose which ships and officers you will use for each battle. This is a fantastic dynamic to the game, making thought, planning and strategy a critical component on the path to victory in this RTS game.Build resources in your base allowing you to improve resource output, build ships and develop new technology. If you are strong or cunning enough you can also loot resources from other players.A vast word map full of riches awaits you, but be careful, other players will seek to target your mining fleets, waiting for an opportune moment to destroy them and steal the resources they have collected.Great daily login rewards, free lottery draws and free plays at events help you build and develop an invincible fleet.[Fortune favours the bold] -Preparation is everything, have your ships ready to seize the moment when it arrives and take the resources you need from an enemy base or mine.[Pre-emptive Strike] - It might already be too late when you see hostile fleets on course for your base or fleet! Strike first and deal a crippling blow to your enemies before they strike against you. Fight for resource spots to mine to bring you more resources to develop your fleet. Recruit better officers and enhance equipment to make your fleets formidable in combat.[Domination] - Deploy your ships wisely and vary fleet formations to have maximum effect against your foe, weaken strong enemies and defeat weaker fleets to truly dominate the ocean! Learn the strengths and weaknesses of each ship class and put them in the best formation to deal devastating attacks on your enemies.For more information you can go to our Facebook page 'Fleet Command Community' (English): Fleet Command CommunityOr visit our forum: https://forum.movga.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=62Email: fc@movga.com
descriptionHTML:
Fleet Command is a naval warfare strategy game based on real life ships and military ranks, providing players a captivating experience of naval wars. Strengthen your power by managing and developing your base, producing resources, building ships, recruiting officers and more. Set sail to discover the vast riches of the sea in the world map. Mine resources, battle pirates and wage war against other players. Establish a Legion and lead your fellow players to glory in battle. With so many aspects to the game there is more to it than raw power, the right combination of officers, equipment and strategy can overcome a more powerful enemy.
The game is very easy to start with and includes a tutorial of the basics, so even players with no experience of RTS or war games will learn very quickly. New functions and equipment are unlocked as your commander level increases, allowing players to learn the game at their own pace. With a vast support network, players can learn the more advanced features of the game and truly understand which path to take to victory.
Features:
Several ship classes of different types, all based on real life ships of the past and present ready for you to build or collect and command. Battle effects include explosions and missile trajectory so you can watch your fleet defeat your enemies.
Flexible formations allowing you to choose which ships and officers you will use for each battle. This is a fantastic dynamic to the game, making thought, planning and strategy a critical component on the path to victory in this RTS game.
Build resources in your base allowing you to improve resource output, build ships and develop new technology. If you are strong or cunning enough you can also loot resources from other players.
A vast word map full of riches awaits you, but be careful, other players will seek to target your mining fleets, waiting for an opportune moment to destroy them and steal the resources they have collected.
Great daily login rewards, free lottery draws and free plays at events help you build and develop an invincible fleet.
[Fortune favours the bold] -Preparation is everything, have your ships ready to seize the moment when it arrives and take the resources you need from an enemy base or mine.
[Pre-emptive Strike] - It might already be too late when you see hostile fleets on course for your base or fleet! Strike first and deal a crippling blow to your enemies before they strike against you. Fight for resource spots to mine to bring you more resources to develop your fleet. Recruit better officers and enhance equipment to make your fleets formidable in combat.
[Domination] - Deploy your ships wisely and vary fleet formations to have maximum effect against your foe, weaken strong enemies and defeat weaker fleets to truly dominate the ocean! Learn the strengths and weaknesses of each ship class and put them in the best formation to deal devastating attacks on your enemies.

For more information you can go to our Facebook page 'Fleet Command Community' (English): Fleet Command Community
Or visit our forum: https://forum.movga.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=62
Email: fc@movga.com
developerAddress: HK

summary: Enjoy real life naval battles in most popular strategy game!
title: Fleet Command – Kill enemy ship & win Legion War

comments: The amount of ads is tolerable, but the fa t that 1 in every 3 or 4 ads locks up and causes the app to shutdown and not gets my rewards is extremely annoying. I enjoy the game but not having it crash on me after every fees races. Will adjust rating if they fix the ad issue.

Come on.  At practically every screen change, there's an ad.  After every race, you choose one box out of five as your reward.  Big flashing instructions tell you to choose your reward.  One in five chance.  Maybe I'll get something good.  Which one?  Alright, here goes... Just won the race, now here comes my reward!  Then an ad comes up.  Doesn't that make it NOT a reward?!?  Wanted to like it.  But I never waste my time on games that are burdensome to play.  And this one was a chore.
The biggest problem are the ads if you choose not to purchase anything. They have ads at every possible opportunity. Other than that, this game get 5 out of 5 from me.
I can't play. Whenever I try to play online ,after the game has started, everything disappears. This has happened to me 3 times in a row. It can't be a coincidence!
The music gets distorted a lot and if you are wearing headphones it will hurt your ears. The gameplay is okay but there is no skill involved you just have to get lucky to win.

It's the same as the last racing game put out by this company.  The only difference is the graphics. Y'all should make something a little more original for a new release. Update something,  change the kayout, something. This is an exact copy if your last game. Sad.

comments: It is very fun and easy to play

In all honesty I LOVE Jetpack Joyride! The things I DON'T love are these: I don't love all the ads...it never use to have all these ads. I don't love that it freezes up on my phone 9/10 forcing me to force stop it to play it. I don't love the fact that despite having it on other android devices and having synced it after getting a new phone I STILL had to start from scratch.

I like this game for the most part. It has a few issues though. Half of the time when I watch a video for a reward it will play the whole video but then tell me "An error occurred. Please try again later." When that happens it doesn't give me the reward and it won't let me try again. But the thing that really bothers me is that it WILL NOT STOP sending me notifications. I've turned off notifications at least 20 times, but when I go back in 10 minutes later it's turned them on again without my permission. I've blocked notifications from the game in my phone settings and that stops it from displaying the notification but it still plays the alert sound every night. It's really starting to irritate me and if it isn't fixed soon I'm going to uninstall this and lower my rating.

I love the game overall, but the only downside I have for it, is how we're not getting discounts on jepacks and clothing anymore. I'm unsure if it's only an android thing, but I really miss that feature. That for me was the reason I grinded this game so much during the time, because I was able to buy them with 50% off, not just buy currency and get it straight away. It would be nice to see some more jepacks too, as well as other content.
Most addictive game I've played in years. Only gripe is when holding screen to speed up end of level timer it restarts 2-3 times.

The game is amazing. I've been playing this since it came out about 7 years ago. The thing is it brings back nostalgia for me and that plays a big part in the core gameplay for me. Thank you guys, you are amazing! One little issue though, sometimes the ads I watch for doubling the points or for the free revive don't work. It just says "an error occured" and it won't do anything. Could you please try to fix this. It's a shame after a good run not to be able the double my points or whenever I would need to revive, it just wouldn't work...

The game is really interesting and entertaining. The graphics are smooth and and the controls are manageable.   The thing I disliked through my game play is that you don't get any clues what you have to do and/or how to defeat the new "enemies". While you understand what exactly you have to do, you've lost some lives. But that's not so important.  I will strongly recommend this game just because of its graphics, entertainment and due the fact, that this game is not pay-to-win game.

I really liked this game. The levels are very challenging and this game is addictive and fun. The only issue is that there are only 5 short lives  that when our lives ran out, we have to wait 18-19 minutes long to have 5 lives again. Of course, there are many hard levels in the game that keeps us dying and think a way to pass the level. So if possible, please shorten the time, like 5-7 minutes only and let us really enjoy the game. It's more even challenging and thrilling if there are many lives. And this game will be really perfect for us. Thank you.

Remember the old days when platformers taught you through trial and error how to interact with new game mechanics? If you don't like that, you'll hate this game. So much fun, so creative, and once you start to get down one of the new features, it ramps it up and keeps you learning creatively how to beat the level. I love this game, it's a fantastic platformer that will challenge you to learn as you go instead of giving you a tutorial every time something new comes up.

Completed all but just couldn't get enough of it. Everyone should play Redball 4. It is D best android games I've ever played. Those who complained about the Game play and control has an abnormal thumb. Easy, Fun & Challenging but nothing impossible to get through. I just hope they make new levels.

Amazing game reminds me of the old school games . But the only problem is the lives you give us to play. They are so few and they take a lot of time to refill. PLEASE remove the life or ball things from this game it will be the best if you do that cause I was playing and level by level I was getting exited and I wanted to rate this game 5 stars but suddenly this GAME OVER thing comes and I had to give you this ratings.please let us play without stopping and waiting for the life to come.

comments: Amazing game very addictive...  Love the fact that they have a specials  more often... Also like the events with the second hospitals... Would like if we had special events more often... Just wish we had a platform to save the game my sister had to restart the game 6 times i had to do it twice... Wou be great to save progress on fb or another platform... Even log in  Really frustrating when we lose progress.... I only need 5 more characters then I'll have them all... So if i lose progress again im not starting over  Overall my favorite game on my phone!! Thx

I'm very upset with this game. I've been playing it for more than two months. I've put a lot of time and effort into this game and I made sure to play it every day for the rewards. Unfortunately, the game started glitching so I uninstalled it  and reinstalled it and all my work is gone. All my money is gone. It's very unfornate. I refuse to start from level one when I was one level 22. I loved this game. Not anymore. 😤

It's a great game at first, but it takes so long to upgrade or save money or anything that you end up spending a lot of your real life money. Plus the surgeries all start to be the exact same, and the glitches... oh, the glitches. Zapped $200,000 out of my bank, and that bloody epinephrine shot is impossible to get without striking out. Oh, and $120,000 for research that will only make you $4,000? Why is everything so time and resource consuming???

Controls don't work properly during surgery! There is lot of lag while performing an action while the timer works properly. Moreover, it doesn't allow me to suture the skin, even if I'm trying to do it right (it worked at the begining). Please fix these bugs or I will uninstal the game...

Let your app data be backed up... My old phone has to be replaced and after a lot of work everything was still not saved. I feel this is a pretty simple thing to have included and a dumb thing to leave out. Fail. Thanks for taking my money and running.

Love the overall feel of this, though some things need tweeking. For example, I only have half of the staff available and am now getting far too many duplicate cards concidering how many I have left to get. Makes it feel all too much like it's pushing people to spend real money, something that always ends with me deleting the game and moving on. Hope this doesn't happen in this case, but I'm not holding my breath...
description: Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital! Game Characteristics🚑  Play the most realistic surgery simulations🚑  Build your own hospital🚑  Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives🚑  Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department🚑  Dive into two captivating seasons 🚑  Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and contentPERFORM SURGERIESPerforming challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITALBuild and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMALive dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors. Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!
descriptionHTML:
Perform challenging surgeries, manage your own hospital, and experience hospital drama in Operate Now: Hospital!

Game Characteristics

🚑 Play the most realistic surgery simulations
🚑 Build your own hospital
🚑 Hire new medical staff members and train them to save lives
🚑 Unlock and carry out researches from the all new medical research department
🚑 Dive into two captivating seasons
🚑 Stay tuned! We’re continuously developing and adding new missions and content

PERFORM SURGERIES

Performing challenging surgeries is at the heart of Operate Now: Hospital. Removing foreign bodies, repairing bone fractures, and performing tracheotomies are only some of the realistic operations available. As a surgeon, you will need a steady hand to both make flawless incisions, and carefully operate on patients. Time to throw on the scrubs!

BUILD YOUR OWN HOSPITAL

Build and manage your very own hospital with Emergency Rooms, Intensive Care Units, and many more departments. You’ll also get to expand and upgrade your hospital to accommodate new departments with newly hired surgeons! It will take a true hospital director to manage such an impressive health care facility!

EXPERIENCE A MEDICAL DRAMA

Live dramatic storylines just like in real medical TV shows. Operate Now: Hospital follows the lives of surgeons and hospital staff members such as Dr. Amy Clarke. As you progress through Seasons 1 and 2, this unique medical adventure will shed light on the mysteries surrounding the hospital, its patients, and its doctors.

Play Operate Now: Hospital and experience the medical world firsthand!

Mussenstraat 15
1223 RB Hilversum

Decided to edit my review to clear things up for people that says this is a money making scheme etc. To the people that say that, do u understand that this game is Free? The devs spend a ton of money making a game enjoyable for people, adding new content such as, new heroes, new events, new upgrading features etc. It's only normal to lock some heroes behind a paid service, and the heroes behind the pay wall isn't even game changing or op. U don't have to spend a cent on this game to make progress. Rolling heroes takes time but it's so rewarding when u get that one hero u were looking for. This is a great game and if u complain about ingame purchases for a game so well maintained then rather go play another free game full of bugs and zero updates.
Absolutely love this game! Been playing forever, this game never gets boring. It's completely free, you just have to be patient and cautious with your materials. Amazing for a free to play app 😍😍

comments: This game is actually really fun, but two stars for the ads. They're not well-distributed, having reached a point where no ads would show up after a few runs, and then one would appear after every run no matter how short. A 30 second ad after a run that ended in just a couple seconds? Multiple times in a row? I understand ads needs to be there, but I'd like to have more play time than ad time.

Very enjoyable game, quite addictive and jumping back into a new game is quick. Couple of gripes, there seems to be some slow down or framrate dipping after an ad has shown and the option to remove ads isn't working. Sort this out and it will get another 2 stars

Great game! Simplistic in the greatest form from graphics to game play. Would be 5 stars but -1 for placement of bottom ad I mean so easy to accidentally hit. Well placed I'm sure....With recent update I think you get random ad runs too. Game 5+ stars. 4 because of ads..

The game itself is pretty fun. I think I'd like it. But the ads are far, far too intrusive. Not only are there too many. But, many of them have timers. Some are 30 seconds, and you can't break out. Too annoying. I have no interest I sitting and waiting for ads to finish

Too redundant. After a couple times it's boring and way too many Ads. I only played 5 rounds and there were Ads after every round. That's 5 Ads for every minute of gameplay (give or take). Developers are making a killing. Little too greedy if you ask me and all of you are falling for it.📵

Waaay too many ads, especially in the beginning when you're still getting the hang of the gameplay. Having to watch a 15 second ad after every crash – given how often that happens – is unnecessary. Granting 3 lives between ads would do a lot to keep players who would otherwise say "I don't have time for this" and drop the app like I did.  I would even be willing to pay to get rid of ads once I know that I like the gameplay, but the current system interrupts play so much that I couldn't even get to that point.
