comments: It's a game where people will get addicted to it after playing it once.. But every time when we are installing app we have to play the untill 1st check point.. Better developers fix this. So after immediately after installing user must go to his account and sync game data..

This game is awesome and addictive. My second First Person Shooter Game After Modern Combat 3: Fallen Nation.  I only wish the Game Developers can bring back the game control we had in Modern Combat 3: Fallen Nation; especially in terms of the gun control, and also create an offline PvP mode using Hotspot and Wi-Fi to connect players. Putting these two features in place will make this game undisputed First Person Shooter Game Ever.  In the near future, we should be considering how one can make real cash while playing online games like this.

I give this game a 5 star, i really love it but the thing is the performance. Back when i first got this game the game would lag really bad when i would get shot, i changed the quality to Better Performance. But after this new update it seems as if the lagging is starting to come back when I'm in a match PLEASE HELP!!!

I like the game but only when i actually works!! It doesn't let me change the graphics settings and it's crashing constantly after each game i play. That's frustrating for such a huge title I'm running android 7.0 on a redmi note 4

This game is really good, but there are some bugs that must've been fixed. For example. I launched my game and played normal campain mode and all of the sudden the game just crashes and after i restarted it. It just completly deleted itself. And i have to wait for freakin 3 hours just to wait for it to download and another 3 hours for the multiplayer

This game is literally my first FPS in my whole life . The contents and gameplay didn't let me down..  But the multiplayer matching system is kinda unfair . I'm lvl90 but I'm getting paired with lvl 140 players with prestige weapons... Can you (Game Developers) fix this unfairness?pls?
description: War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile! Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic’s apocalyptic plans.You won’t find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes. > Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER > Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN > Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.So if you’re ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/FBMCGPTwitter: http://gmlft.co/twmcgpInstagram: http://gmlft.co/GL_SNS_IGYouTube: http://gmlft.co/ytmcgpForum: http://gmlft.co/MC5FRThis app allows you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third-party advertisements that may redirect you to a third-party site.Terms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en/conditions-of-usePrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en/privacy-noticeEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en/eula
descriptionHTML:
War has evolved, and so has the best online FPS on mobile!

Step onto the battlefield and answer the call with the title that raised the bar for first person shooter games with its great graphics, high-powered guns and intense online multiplayer action. Create a squad from 9 classes, add your friends for team play and test your skills in dynamic warfare against online rivals from around the world!

Prefer to work alone? Then feel free to step into the thrilling solo play campaign as you shoot your way through one dire situation after another to save the world as you launch an attack against a lunatic’s apocalyptic plans.

You won’t find more first person shooter fun in a free game anywhere!

9 CLASSES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS
> Customize and level up any of the 9 classes across solo play and team play modes.
> Find the playstyle that suits you: Assault, Heavy, Recon, Sniper, Support, Bounty Hunter, Sapper, X1-Morph, or Kommander.
> Activate class-specific skills by earning and spending Skill Points.

HIGH-POWERED ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
> Watch players engaged in live online FPS battles and eSports competitions with all the great graphics you expect in the new Spectator mode.
> Epic guns-a-blazing team play in Squad vs. Squad matches.
> Talk to other players to plan your online multiplayer strategies and coordinate an attack in the Global and Squad Chats.
> Top the individual and Squads leaderboards as you master your eSports skills.
> Win free rewards and cool prizes in limited-time events.

UNIFIED GAME PROGRESSION
> Accumulate XP and level up by playing both solo play missions and team play matches.
> Unlock higher-tier guns and other weapons by mastering lower-tier guns.
> Customize the perfect weapon using a host of attachments and jump straight into the free game action.

INTENSE SOLO PLAY CAMPAIGN
> Engage in fast-paced story missions where the call will take you from Tokyo to Venice for a variety of first person shooter challenges.
> Play the new Spec Ops missions for a real online FPS adrenaline rush.
> Great graphics, music and voice performances perfectly adapted for a first person shooter game.

HIGHLY CUSTOMIZABLE CONTROLS
> Intuitive, highly customizable controls so you can play the game just the way you want.
> Modern Combat 5 supports HID game controllers. MOGA Pro is also supported, in mode B (HID Mode).

Modern Combat 5 requires an Internet connection.

So if you’re ready for the online FPS of your dreams, dive into this unparalleled free game that takes online multiplayer to new heights. Perfect for anyone hungry for solo play first person shooter fun, or team play eSports competition.

recentChanges: Squad Wars – Fighting alongside friends just got better: Play and unlock instant rewards.
Prestige weapons improvements – Added attachments and revamped color customization options to the game's most beloved weapons.

comments: Das Quiz bricht mitten drin ab und funktioniert nicht mehr, musste App schließen und habe Fragen verpasst da bei Quizduell alle drei Fragen ja auf einen Haufen kommen, was übrigens sehr nervtötend ist und mir nicht gerade Lust darauf mach es öfter zu spielen. Und im großen und ganzen hängt die App sowieso sehr oft. Dafür das ARD soviel Geld hat, sollte man meinen sie könnten eine wenigstens mehr oder minder funktionierende App erstellen lassen. Schlechteste Game App die ich je hatte. Hoffe nach den ganzen negativen Reviews wird daran irgendwann einmal was verbessert.
Live mitspielen funtioniert gar nicht

Bitte mehr Notifications, wenn man dran ist, bzw ne neue Frage kommt. Beim Duell kann man vor der Finalfrage nicht zurückgehen, um sich den Spielstand anzusehen, häufig bleibt die App auch hängen....  Finde die App grundsätzlich gut, aber es gibt noch viele Kleinigkeiten und technische Probleme.
Es werden keine Fragen eingeblendet, wieder gelöscht.

Die App reagiert sehr zeitverzögert, was noch das geringste Problem ist. Teilweise darf ich gar nicht mitraten, weil die Frage mir nicht gestellt wird, teilweise wird die Frage nicht Mal eine Sekunde lang eingeblendet und dann war sie wieder weg. Punkte werden mir erst gegeben wenn ich die App neustarte. Die 2 Sterne gibt es für die Idee und die Sendung. Die Umsetzung ist sehr schlecht, bitte überarbeiten!   Edit: die angesprochenen Fehler habe ich jetzt nicht mehr bemerkt. Dafür trat ein anderer auf: mir wurde die Frage gar nicht gestellt und sofort rot markiert und ich konnte nachgucken was die richtige Antwort war (ohne das die tv-show schon soweit gewesen wäre). Nachdem ich die richtige Antwort wusste, wurde mir die Frage dann doch gestellt und ich konnte antworten. Punkte habe ich dann auch bekommen

Die App ist im grossen und ganzen gut. Allerdings sind Fragen zum Teil einfach verschwunden, bevor man überhaupt die Antworten lesen konnte. Das ist sehr frustrierend besonders, wenn man die Arbeit weiss.
description: Die offizielle ARD Quiz-AppIn der offiziellen ARD Quiz App findest du ein breites Mitspielangebot zu den beliebten Quiz- und Showsendungen der ARD. Ganz neu ist das Modul zur Sendung „Quizduell“ im Vorabendprogramm des Ersten. Hier kannst du nicht nur live während der Show miträtseln, sondern mit deinen Antworten sogar das Studiogeschehen beeinflussen! Zusammen mit anderen App-Spielern bildest du nämlich das „Team Deutschland“. Gemeinsam mit dem Teamkapitän im Studio habt ihr die Möglichkeit, um den Tagessieg zu spielen. Neun App-Spieler erhalten bei  gewonnenem Spiel anschließend sogar einen Teil des Preisgeldes – ausgelost per Zufallsgenerator!Auch bei der „NDR Quizshow“ im Sonntagabend-Programm des NDR Fernsehens kannst du mit der ARD Quiz App dein Wissen rund um Norddeutschland live unter Beweis stellen. Vielleicht bist du ja sogar heller als die „Leuchte des Nordens“ im Studio?Auch wenn die beliebte Quizshow „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ im Vorabend-Programm des Ersten nicht gesendet wird, kannst du mit dem entsprechenden Modul in der ARD Quiz App weiter Dein Wissen unter Beweis stellen. Stell dich den kniffeligen Fragen und fordere deine Freunde oder andere App-Spieler zu einem Duell heraus! Natürlich kannst du auch im Spiel gegen die TV-Teams antreten und dich mit Bernhard Hoëcker und Elton messen.Bei den XXL-Ausgaben von „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ am Wochenende zur Prime Time im Ersten kannst du live mitzuspielen. Entscheidest du dich zu Beginn des Spiels für das richtige Gewinner-Team, kannst du mit etwas Glück sogar Geld gewinnen – und zwar den gleichen Betrag, den auch das Publikum im Studio erhält! Viel Spaß beim Mitraten in der ARD Quiz App!
descriptionHTML:
Die offizielle ARD Quiz-App

In der offiziellen ARD Quiz App findest du ein breites Mitspielangebot zu den beliebten Quiz- und Showsendungen der ARD.

Ganz neu ist das Modul zur Sendung „Quizduell“ im Vorabendprogramm des Ersten. Hier kannst du nicht nur live während der Show miträtseln, sondern mit deinen Antworten sogar das Studiogeschehen beeinflussen! Zusammen mit anderen App-Spielern bildest du nämlich das „Team Deutschland“. Gemeinsam mit dem Teamkapitän im Studio habt ihr die Möglichkeit, um den Tagessieg zu spielen. Neun App-Spieler erhalten bei gewonnenem Spiel anschließend sogar einen Teil des Preisgeldes – ausgelost per Zufallsgenerator!

Auch bei der „NDR Quizshow“ im Sonntagabend-Programm des NDR Fernsehens kannst du mit der ARD Quiz App dein Wissen rund um Norddeutschland live unter Beweis stellen. Vielleicht bist du ja sogar heller als die „Leuchte des Nordens“ im Studio?

Auch wenn die beliebte Quizshow „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ im Vorabend-Programm des Ersten nicht gesendet wird, kannst du mit dem entsprechenden Modul in der ARD Quiz App weiter Dein Wissen unter Beweis stellen. Stell dich den kniffeligen Fragen und fordere deine Freunde oder andere App-Spieler zu einem Duell heraus! Natürlich kannst du auch im Spiel gegen die TV-Teams antreten und dich mit Bernhard Hoëcker und Elton messen.

Bei den XXL-Ausgaben von „Wer weiß denn sowas?“ am Wochenende zur Prime Time im Ersten kannst du live mitzuspielen. Entscheidest du dich zu Beginn des Spiels für das richtige Gewinner-Team, kannst du mit etwas Glück sogar Geld gewinnen – und zwar den gleichen Betrag, den auch das Publikum im Studio erhält!

Viel Spaß beim Mitraten in der ARD Quiz App!
summary: Here you can find Mitspielangebote to quiz and show broadcasts on ARD
title: ARD Quiz

comments: I really wanted to like this game. Fun game in concept with really adorable graphics. Its a shame its basically another "money burner" game with levels (past 50) you cant get past without using costly boosters (ex, 2 boosters cost $2.50 worth of coins). There is absolutly no reason you shouldnt be able to beat the higher levels without spending $5+ a level to advance.

Am not much on matching games but this one I felt compelled to comment on because it's much different than most. It's whimsical, very cute and animated. I think children would certainly enjoy this game quite a bit but is also adorable and entertaining for adults. If you like matching games you need to download this game, I'm sure you'll agree it doesn't disappoint. 👍👍

I used to LOVE this game... But then they added ads in the game every time your screen changes! I get you need ads to make money but it's ridiculous with this game. In addition they are the video ads that blare and made a scene too. I'll sadly be uninstalling the game now. I'm so disappointed.
Excessive ads to the point where I get them if I accidentally tap pause and after every level. It's another candy crush style game with levels locked behind Facebook friends, money, or patience.
I like the game but when doing the daily quest (fb) it will NEVER let me get to the end. It always resets! Very frustrating. Please fix!

It is kind of fun, but a lot of times in the middle of making connections between the tiles it just stops and you wasted one of your little moves. Some levels are really easy others are not really manageable without coins, which leads to the problem, that the 'free' game will get you to buy it anyways.....
description: Simon’s Cat in Crunch Time! -  a Match 3 puzzle adventurePublished by Strawdog.The devilish crows have swiped Simon’s Cat’s favourite Tasty Treats and only YOU can help him find them!Join Simon’s Cat, Maisy, Chloe and Jazz, and a cast of determined kitties on a colourful adventure through some pawsome new places where Treats are just waiting to be eaten.Be ready to collect Tasty Treats, fight off big baddies and befriend a host of animal critters in this FREE puzzle game with added CATitude!Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay! Connect the same coloured Treats to make a delicious chain!Play your way through the neighbourhood in six different game modes and hundreds of challenging levels!Challenge your friends! Can you beat your friends purrfect high score?Can you beat the villains? Use your Treats and special boosters to fight off Sir Royston the Pug, Mr Potts, hungry hedgehogs and even a treat crazed vacuum cleaner!Play with Simon’s Cat featuring brand new animationsSimon's Cat is the internet’s most mischievous cat and has become a global phenomenon. Star of over 60 films, which have been watched over 870 million times, and winner of several major industry awards, Simon's Cat has captured the hearts of a worldwide audience.We are working hard to update the game with new levels that are purrfectly crafted and will leave you feline great!

comments: Amazing improvement!! I like this one way way better than the others!! These challenges that come with the higher levels are kinda tricky but can be done!! I'm at Level 712 and Have NOT been able to do any improvements to Stella's Home in Well Over 400 Levels!!!! When Are WE Going to Have Some Improvements Available???

Good things Never had so much fun in aiming games. This one is the best one ever. The best is to lead the gost upwards without the bats. Bad things We don't get gold bars and beam power up. It is very rarely found and gold bars are not available.

This game is fantastic I am way ahead of where I thought would be considered I just started this game a week or two ago great . Add on I'm in world seven and I not stopping till I destroy that evil cat. Any chance of is there a bubble witch 4 I whould  be interested in how I can get it .?

I'm a 63 yr old grandma with disabilities that keep me bedridden (and bored). I play Bubble Witch 3 all day! Game play keeps my mind sharp and I love the graphics. I get stuck on some levels so I appreciate the added tutorial help.

Pathetic 50 fairy dust for reward. That's pathetic. I reinstalled this believing that YOU, the developers actually read these. Aha, not likely. I quit as want players to spend $$ in order to win. You also may enjoying players as they fail & not succeed. Shame on you.

AMAZING! Much better than previous BWitch and I love the animated Ghosts moving along the top when baby Ghost get closer! Also love renovating Stella's house Great game  :) ...just the huge piggy bank is annoying now :(
description: Bubble Witch 3 Saga – A magical bubble shooting puzzle game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga.The newest game in the popular Bubble Witch series. Stella the Witch is back and she needs your help to defeat Wilbur in this exciting puzzle blasting adventure! Wilbur may look cute, but he's full of magical mischief! Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game.Help Stella, Nero and Violet restore piece to the realm by matching bubbles with the unique aiming line that allows you and Stella to blast and pop with magical precision! Solve the puzzles to reunite the ghosts, save the owls and rescue the important fairy queen in this explosive bubble shooting adventure. Cast spells and power ups with Nero and blast your way through those extra tough levels to keep up with the mischievous Wilbur!Blast! Stella needs to rebuild her home all thanks to the evil Wilbur. Take aim and pop your way through the levels to find the magic star dust Stella needs in order to rebuild, customize and style her new home!The only bubble shooter you will ever need! Take on this magical Saga alone or pop with friends, burst their bubble by setting an all new high-score.Bubble Witch 3 Saga features: • Match 3 bubbles to pop them in this magical puzzle shooting adventure • Spellbinding game modes and cute characters!• Release the owls, free the ghosts and save the Fairy Queen from Wilbur!• Rebuild Stella’s house and visit your friends to get rewards • Special boosters to help you pass those tricky levels• Easily sync the game between devices when connected to the Internet• Leader boards to watch your friends and competitors!• A free & easy to play bubble shooter, challenging to master! • Available to play on Android phone and tablet devicesBubble Witch 3 Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.Visit https://care.king.com/ if you need help!Follow us to get news and updates:https://www.facebook.com/bubblewitch3sagahttp://www.youtube.com/c/Bubble_Witchhttps://www.instagram.com/bubblewitchsagaofficial/http://www.twitter.com/Bubble_WitchStart the bubble bursting experience today!Have fun playing Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Wilbur may look cute, but he's full of magical mischief! Travel the realm bursting as many bubbles as you can in this bubble shooting puzzle game.

Help Stella, Nero and Violet restore piece to the realm by matching bubbles with the unique aiming line that allows you and Stella to blast and pop with magical precision! Blast! Stella needs to rebuild her home all thanks to the evil Wilbur. Take aim and pop your way through the levels to find the magic star dust Stella needs in order to rebuild, customize and style her new home!

comments: I have loved Hot Wheels for years and this is a good game. Fun and challenging. However I have been a bit frustrated because sometimes I just explode for touching a wall like on level 6. Awesome😒 Not to mention I sometimes just hit a ramp and don't reach the end and fall into a void. Also fix your Poppa Wheelie's handling. You killed it, literally. Just try and fix your game a bit and I will give a 5.

Horrendous abuse of in game ads like I've never seen before in an app. At some points, you literally cannot proceed until you open the play store. The game races are short balancing acts wherein you simply try to keep your car on its wheels. Do not download, and do not let your kids start playing.

Good graphics. If you fail and do exact same again you may pass level if you level up car, you end up failing sooner and have to slow down but after trying 7 r 8 times gets annoying and the level up car is worse than your basic car. Too frustrating so deleting

I've been playing this app for a while now and up intil now I loved it but ever since the daily race-off challenge the game has been full of bugs. The daily race-off is a great idea but there are just too many bugs in it. I lose lives when I didn't even lose the race or I lose all my lives when I only lost one race.

Game is good graphics are also good but it tends to get crash several times when I played it. I have a moto g5 plus phone with 4gb ram and adreno 508 GPU and all the games played very smoothly in my phone even asphalt 8 also ,i don't think so it's my phone who is not handling the game so there should be some bugs in this game  please fix as soon as possible.

The game is my little boys favourite but the recent batch of adverts in game (Yahoo specifically) don't close - meaning you have to force quit the game. Lazy programming and terrible QA process from the developers. Avoid.

- To go down, slide your finger from the same button to the bottom arrow;
- To land, press again on the button in the center of the joystick.

The animations are rag-dolly sometimes but other than that it's perfect. I have one suggestion for Nekki. Why aren't you guys making games for consoles? You're too advanced for mobile. You could be the future mortal kombat sensation.

Graphics are awesome, it controls and plays very well. Fights are slick and intense with wonderful animation that makes great use of slow-mo to highlight big moves and finishing hits. The only real barrier to me giving this a full hearted recommendation is that there are microtransactions ALL OVER THE PLACE. If you don't like those distracting you constantly, not the game for you.

Kudos

description: Step into the world of shadows at the time of changes. Reveal all its dark secrets and become the greatest warrior this land has ever seen. In this RPG-fighting game you will take on a role of a hero whose destiny isn't determined yet. How do you see the future? It's your call! Choose from three different fighting styles, experiment, combine your gear, learn some fresh new moves and explore a massive world full of adventures! Enjoy the beauty of a real fight which has been made possible due to modern technologies and smooth animations. CREATE YOUR OWN FIGHTING STYLE Shadow Fight 3 offers you 3 unique fighting styles to choose from. Collect new moves, perks, weapons, gear and combine them in the way YOU like it. Be fast and graceful, strong and shattering, enigmatic and deadly. Raise a character that will represent your distinctive playing technique and personality. AT THE EDGE OF TECHNOLOGY Shadow Fight 3 brings the fighting genre to a whole new technological level. Colorful graphics, smooth animations, realistic physics and effects create a picture of a living and breathing world you've never seen before!  DEEP AND IMMERSIVE STORYLINE Shadow Fight 3 is a story-driven game. You'll find yourself in a dangerous world that is on the threshold of a great war with you in the middle. Three powerful factions are tearing these lands apart and plotting against each other. Which side would you choose? You decide! MANAGE YOUR GEAR COLLECTION. There's large amount of weapons and armor in Shadow Fight 3. If you've ever dreamed of having a rare collection of war goods, now's your time! The world of shadows has got splendid rewards for the most adventurous ones! Collect epic gear, combine and upgrade it, equip it with new lethal moves and perks. Fight your enemy with style! It is all limited by your imagination only. Shadow Fight 3 in a nutshell: - Smooth animations and lifelike physics- Spectacular SHADOW-based fighting mechanics- Lots of gear and weapons to collect- Gorgeous visuals- Three unique factions and fighting styles- Hundreds of perks and supermoves- Character creation tool- Diverse fighting modes

comments: It's an OK game. If it doesn't lock up in the next few days I'll come back and give a better review.  So many of these games end up costing you a bunch of money, then the errors start. I've already put 3 games on my pad, spent money on them, and now they're useless so I will reserve my review until I see what happens with this game.

Very good time killer. Do not buy other vehicle than Titan, it is waste of money/time. I'm not sure if multipkayer is really online, maybe its a fake only (continues even if you leave the app and return back)

Hill Climb meets Tank Wars. Simple but fun time-burner. You can upgrade your tank with in-game coins. Purchase option available but then you don't get to enjoy the challenge. Grind it out and earn those upgrades. Enjoy!

Move forward, flip over and die Move backward, flip over and die Fire the canon, flip over and die Hit by another canon, flip over and die Ram a tank, flip over and die Rammed by another tank, flip over and die Sit perfectly still, flip over and die.  Terrible, terrible controls.  Edit: I'm happy to say they removed the Flip and Die feature and now the game is quite enjoyable. Well worth playing!

Very pay to win and matchmaking isn't great.  Matches new players against players with tons of upgrades.  I know that's a common tactic to encourage those new players to buy the better tanks with cash, but it just made me remove the game.

Alittle bit boring but it has good graphits and makes the players exciting while beating at the enemies . However, to get more excellent tanks like Tesla , it takes so many long times and difficult to hore the coins. I wonder if this game is easy to get coins .  Bravo!

description: With over 5 BILLION downloads and worldwide hits like My Talking Tom and My Talking Angela, Talking Tom and Friends now has a BRAND NEW free app. Introducing: My Talking Hank! Take care of Talking Hank, the cutest puppy out there. Hank needs your ❤️ ! He’s ready for adventure and off to explore the tropical islands of Hawaii, but HE NEEDS YOU to help him!★ TAKE CARE OF YOUR PUPPYAdopt your very own puppy, little cute baby Hank. He is one of a kind. A puppy so sweet you can’t look away! Take care of Hank, your new favorite virtual pet. Feed him delicious food, take him to the toilet and swing him to sleep on a hammock under a starry sky.★ HELP HANK COLLECT ALL THE ANIMALSHank loves photography! He wants to take picture of every wild animal living on the island. And there are plenty of them to discover - from a fluffy White Bunny, to a silly Flamingo, gangster Hip Hop Hippo and many more. Travel through different zones of the island. Place toys and food for the animals. Wait for them to show up and… CLICK! ... collect their photos.★ FUN BEYOND FUNTalking Hank will not only repeat everything you say with a hilarious voice, Hank takes fun to the next level! Laugh out loud at his constant adventures, his toilet shenanigans and much, much more! If you enjoy tamagotchi-style apps and kitty collector game mechanics you will fall in love with My Talking Hank.★ FEATURESWelcome to Hawaii: Check out your wonderful island home! It looks cool night and day!Raise Hank: Hank needs you to take care of him, from feeding to visiting the toilet!Take Photos: Help Hank complete his photo album by taking pictures of wild, exotic animals.Attract animals: Some of them are scared of Hank, you’ll need food and toys to lure them out!Keep playing: There are more features to discover in My Talking Hank, so keep exploring!This app contains:- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via YouTube integration- The option to make in-app purchases- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (level progress, in-game functionalities) Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/
descriptionHTML:
With over 5 BILLION downloads and worldwide hits like My Talking Tom and My Talking Angela, Talking Tom and Friends now has a BRAND NEW free app. Introducing: My Talking Hank! Take care of Talking Hank, the cutest puppy out there. Hank needs your ❤️ ! He’s ready for adventure and off to explore the tropical islands of Hawaii, but HE NEEDS YOU to help him!

★ TAKE CARE OF YOUR PUPPY
Adopt your very own puppy, little cute baby Hank. He is one of a kind. A puppy so sweet you can’t look away! Take care of Hank, your new favorite virtual pet. Feed him delicious food, take him to the toilet and swing him to sleep on a hammock under a starry sky.

★ HELP HANK COLLECT ALL THE ANIMALS
Hank loves photography! He wants to take picture of every wild animal living on the island. And there are plenty of them to discover - from a fluffy White Bunny, to a silly Flamingo, gangster Hip Hop Hippo and many more. Travel through different zones of the island. Place toys and food for the animals. Wait for them to show up and… CLICK! ... collect their photos.

★ FUN BEYOND FUN
Talking Hank will not only repeat everything you say with a hilarious voice, Hank takes fun to the next level! Laugh out loud at his constant adventures, his toilet shenanigans and much, much more! If you enjoy tamagotchi-style apps and kitty collector game mechanics you will fall in love with My Talking Hank.

★ FEATURES
Welcome to Hawaii: Check out your wonderful island home! It looks cool night and day!
Raise Hank: Hank needs you to take care of him, from feeding to visiting the toilet!
Take Photos: Help Hank complete his photo album by taking pictures of wild, exotic animals.
Attract animals: Some of them are scared of Hank, you’ll need food and toys to lure them out!
Keep playing: There are more features to discover in My Talking Hank, so keep exploring!

This app contains:
- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising
- Links that direct customers to our websites and other Outfit7 apps
- Personalization of content to entice users to play the app again
- Watching videos of Outfit7's animated characters via YouTube integration
- The option to make in-app purchases
- Items are available for different prices in virtual currency, depending on the current level reached by the player
- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (level progress, in-game functionalities)

Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/
Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/

This game might not look so good when you download it, but there is a lot you can do. Buy properties to get money, buy guns armor, cars. There are plenty of minigames and quick play missions like street races, survival, and parachuting. The storyline may only be decent, but the missions are still fun.  The only real problem is the file size. You have to dedicate too much of your storage, if you have a newer phone with more built in storage, or a microSD card, you should try this game.

Overall Amazing game and there's nobody else making games like this on the app store!! Great job! 10 out of 10 stars!!!

description: Roll up on a dangerously fun, wildly expansive, and overwhelmingly rich trip to the City of Sin!Enjoy everything Vegas has to offer, from shooting up rival gangs and stealing cars to race down the strip, to pushing your luck at the casino and customizing your threads. You can even take off into the sky as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS√ Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighting star whose dreams of becoming a Battle Royale champ clash with a world of theft, gang wars, zombies and more in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE.√ Fight your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action, auto races, shooting and more. Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.√ Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN√ Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you’ll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.√ Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.√ Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!√ Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.√ Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn’t the only way to make the big bucks!RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE√ Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.√ Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there’s no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!√ UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.√ CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL√ Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.THE STORY:In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano’s perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up._____________________________________________Visit our official site at http://gmlft.co/website_ENCheck out the new blog at http://gmlft.co/centralDon't forget to follow us on social media:Facebook: http://gmlft.co/GVonFacebookTwitter: http://gmlft.co/SNS_TW_ENInstagram:http://gmlft.co/GVonInstagramYouTube:http://gmlft.co/GVonYoutubeForum: http://gmlft.co/GV_ForumPrivacy Policy: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/privacy-noticeTerms of Use: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/conditions-of-useEnd-User License Agreement: http://www.gameloft.com/en-gb/eula
descriptionHTML:
Roll up on a dangerously fun, wildly expansive, and overwhelmingly rich trip to the City of Sin!
Enjoy everything Vegas has to offer, from shooting up rival gangs and stealing cars to race down the strip, to pushing your luck at the casino and customizing your threads. You can even take off into the sky as you explore every inch of this criminal paradise.

WELCOME TO OUTRAGEOUS LAS VEGAS
√ Play as a mixed martial arts (MMA) fighting star whose dreams of becoming a Battle Royale champ clash with a world of theft, gang wars, zombies and more in a BLOCKBUSTER STORY MODE.
√ Fight your way through 80 MISSIONS filled with action, auto races, shooting and more. Use your skills and your brain to counter every challenge they throw at you.
√ Build up clans of criminals to strike from the shadows against your many enemies.

ENDLESS SANDBOX FUN
√ Explore a BIGGER CITY, 9x the size of the previous Gangstar game, for a ridiculously fleshed-out mobile world where you’ll always find something new to do and thefts to commit.
√ Perform awesome stunts with ragdoll effects that are as fun to see succeed as they are to watch fail horribly, thanks to amazing use of the HAVOK PHYSICS engine.
√ Watch your name climb the Leaderboards as you overcome grand CHALLENGES including air, water and street auto races, MMA fights, FPS showdowns & more!
√ Become Vegas's finest sniper by shooting it up in Carnage & Heist modes.
√ Break the bank as you kill it in addictive CASINO GAMES. Theft isn’t the only way to make the big bucks!

RIDE ON THE WILD SIDE
√ Access INSANE WEAPONS like Molotov cocktails, long-range sniper rifles, flamethrowers & an electric guitar! Choose the right one to counter any threat.
√ Stay mobile as you drive CRAZY VEHICLES including monster trucks, muscle cars, tanks & fighter jets. So strap in -- there’s no auto-pilot for these dogs of war!
√ UPGRADE YOUR SKILLS for more deft theft, sharper sniper strikes, and better race-car control.
√ CUSTOMIZE YOUR GEAR and look like anything you wish: a mechanized robot, boxing champ, shambling zombie, etc.

BEYOND THE MORTAL COIL

√ Kill zombies, try boxing with robots, and even strike out against the shadow clans of HELL itself as your story takes you to unbelievable locations.

THE STORY:
In this third-person shooting game, you play as a rising MMA champion. Framed by the mafia, you are supposed to throw your bout at the fighting event of the year. But when your opponent beats you to the punch and goes down first, famous gang lord Frank Veliano’s perfect plan goes down too. You have just become the most wanted man in the city. In a dog-eat-dog world where crime is everywhere, you will have to hold your gun tight to combat the wildest gang ever!
Welcome to Las Vegas, where fortunes are made and lives are lost with a roll of the dice!

For fans of FPS action, auto racing, driving (autos or tanks), robots, zombie clans, games with car theft, and free mobile games.

This game supports smartphones and tablets running Android 2.3 and up.

Classic gameply bogged down by aggravating fremium distration. Havent run into any energy bars yet and already on second world. New birds add interesting gameplay elements but spells are an automatic win that add no semse of achievement besides skipping a hard level. If you want some classic angry birds but dont mind clicking through to get to it then give this a download.

There is an extremely annoying ad that will freeze the app, I don't know what it is for, but it's animated, shows a city street, moving van, starts at 36 sec.  I can't leave it when it freezes, have to leave app entirely, go back to where I left. If I click again and same app appears I can't receive my reward.

I really think the tower is rigged. 1 in 4 chance of getting the pig but it seems to happen ALL the time. Cant get past the 6th or 7th floor. However if you spend lots o money to buy gems I guess it can be done. Not for me I am out.

He game starts out with tutorials, but they act like you've never played angry birds before. Theres a world map which is cool, but its not needed and is just boring. The worst part about this game is that you can only lose 5 times a day. I just want to play the game like how the original game played!
description: Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.SPECTACULAR SPELLS!Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? descriptionHTML:
Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?

CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!
It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!

NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!
You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.

SPECTACULAR SPELLS!
Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!
Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!

DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!
There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.

descriptionHTML:
★It's an addictive Piano Music Game with tons of modes and songs! There are stunning graphics and soothing music! Don't touch on the white tiles and enjoy your time! Enjoy the piano online!

If you have a dream of becoming a professional pianist like Beethoven, Chopin or Mozart. Now you have the chance to challenge with these masters. Piano White Go! comes! It's an wonderful piano online game!

You can experience kinds of funny games which are mapped into the tiles of piano world, don't hesitate to have a try! Follow the rhythm to tap the tiles of piano, avoid to touch the white tiles.

If you are tired of those challenges, there are several other funny modes. You will find fun from this game no matter you are a music fan or just enjoy the speed of tapping tiles. It is definitely more challenging than you could imagine.

✔How to play:
- Follow rhythm to tap the black tiles and play piano music songs
- Watch out for the white tiles and never miss any piano black tiles
- Collect gold and diamonds as more as you can to unlock new songs

✔Hot Features:
- Awesome design and graphics
- High quality piano music sound tracks
- More than 90 classical songs
- More than 7 color piano tiles to select, Pink , Green, Purple, Gold etc.
- Single Player and Multiple Player mode both are available
- After you play the whole piano song, the endless mode will be unlocked
- Make your favorite songs freely and easy to access
- Hit great achievements to win tons of diamonds and gold coins
- Collection of mini games to help you relax with the music melody
- Leader-board and Google Play Game Services support

Support:
Are you having problems? Send email to support@pianowhitego.com or contact us in game by going to Settings > FAQ and Support.


Piano White Go! is a music game for ever free. You can play anytime anywhere, download it now to improve your music talent and skill. Be a music master of the piano game! Be a piano white master!

You can leave messages to us which song you like best. We are frequently updating the Piano White Go!

comments: It's nice game - very nice graphic, very smooth moving - it would be 5 stars. BUT - I payed for levels 13 and 14 , and the game does not allow me to play in random order - it's not possible to play no. 23 without finishing all numbers before. If you are stuck in some number, you cannot go to another one - you MUST BUY hint!!! It means - you PAID for the game, but you MUST PAY again for hint - or you are blocked in PAID  game. It's just not fair.

A lot of Numberlink programs have "fake" puzzles - they have multiple solutions unless additional non-standard "rules" are followed... which are NEVER fun. This app doesn't do that. These are the real deal, and are VERY satisfying to solve. The price is extremely low for the quantity and quality on offer; I highly recommend this game.

I have now completed a 365 day streak... During this past year of playing this game daily, I've had an idea. What if once you hit a certain amount of streak days you unlock a new something? Like a new pack or flow color? That would be nice so that you are working towards something. :)

I loved flow free from a young age. I've played until 9×9 pack but when I reached a certain level,  the game stopped working after that and I've tried over and over again to go in but the game just keeps bring me back to the home screen and keeps stopping. Please fix it. I really want to play the remaining levels and packs

Great game. Keep coming back to it. I find it relaxing solving the puzzles, though it has become super easy! All versions are great. All in all, awesome job! One of my favourites, and works in any situation. Quick break at work, something productive ? Play. Something to do before sleep? Play. Got a few extra mins? Play! Wanna challenge yourself on timed? Play! Haha.

Was a great game until about 48 hours ago. I didn't mind the ads but now after every level I complete there's a video ad. Even then I would deal with it but it closes my music player. So after the ad I have to go to the music player and start it again but then when I switch back to the game I have to relaunch and reselect the level. Gets annoying to have to do after every level

comments: It's a good story and all. But I only wish they would let me save up energy or at least give me a little more. It gets frustrating when I can't Carry on, I'm not a patient person. Graphics are good. Controls are good. Story is great! Loving most of this game so far. I just hope they change the energy part of it. Though I guess it's a lot easier to read thn most episode stories.

Love the game. Nice graphics and good storyline. But like everyone else, I agree with the energy problem. It's absolutely ridiculous! Plus the story just suddenly stopped?! Been waiting for 3 wks for it to start again. The app has updated 4 times the past 2 wks and nothing. Been so long, I forgot where it left off. Seems like a scam and a money grab. I spent a lot of money, and no more story? Not happy at all!

Loving the story so far and the graphics.. It's all so beautiful. Only wish that they would give you more energy over time to read it.. when you lose time to read you lose interest in the story by the waiting. Help us stay interested!

I love it! all though I can't help but wonder when the MC finds out they're vampires does she either go to Sarah's when she's on her period or just stays there? I honestly wonder how that whole scenario would play out.
Please change the fact you have to wait a whole day for enery.. Make it every 5 hours or something I really enjoy it and not everyone has the money to spend

What amazing graphics 1492 studio..........it's sad we don't get more energys alot of readers will soon get board or my favorite one is irritated as hell because it's takes no time to go through them then on top that u got to wait till following day what is that plzzzzzzz keep your readers happily interested!!!!!!!
description: Is it Love? Peter - Vampire is an interactive game (choice game). A game with vampires, Witches, and werewolves.Like in TV sitcoms, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released. You can download this interactive love game (choice game) for free.In each episode, you'll have a lot of choices to take in order to make it YOUR story, YOUR romance!Story:"Having had supernatural faculties since your childhood, you decided to leave everything to go get some answers at the strange Mystery Spell University. You found a job and accommodation at the Bartholy Manor. In exchange for your services, taking care of the younger sister, Lorie, you live with them. The city's inhabitants fear them terribly, the evil shadow of their father weighs in all consciences ... Many mysteries surround the Bartholy brothers and you will quickly discover that the whole city has things to hide. Many people at Mystery Spell have strange secrets ...However, only one inhabitant is always on your mind and arouses your curiosity, and that is Peter, the most mysterious and most melancholic of the Bartholy brothers. Will you manage to tame him without putting yourself in danger? Will he confide his darkest secrets...?"Strong points:✓ Meet with Vampires and Witches.✓ It's your game: Your choices influence the story.✓ A 100% free Otome Game in English✓ A new visual adventure.An Otome is a visual novel type game in which you are the heroine about to live true romance (love story) with possible twists (Love, seduction, betrayal, marriage...) depending on the choices you make (choice game)Download this vampire game, if you :✓ Like love stories or stories about Vampires and Witches✓ Watch romantic films✓ Read Mangas with vampires or Witches✓ Want to live a love Story✓ Discover a new otome in EnglishFollow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Is.it.Love.GamesShould you have any questions or queries on this otome -> http://support.1492.ioIs-it Love ? is free to download. descriptionHTML:
Is it Love? Peter - Vampire is an interactive game (choice game). A game with vampires, Witches, and werewolves.
Like in TV sitcoms, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released. You can download this interactive love game (choice game) for free.
In each episode, you'll have a lot of choices to take in order to make it YOUR story, YOUR romance!

Story:
"Having had supernatural faculties since your childhood, you decided to leave everything to go get some answers at the strange Mystery Spell University. You found a job and accommodation at the Bartholy Manor. In exchange for your services, taking care of the younger sister, Lorie, you live with them. The city's inhabitants fear them terribly, the evil shadow of their father weighs in all consciences ... Many mysteries surround the Bartholy brothers and you will quickly discover that the whole city has things to hide. Many people at Mystery Spell have strange secrets ...
However, only one inhabitant is always on your mind and arouses your curiosity, and that is Peter, the most mysterious and most melancholic of the Bartholy brothers. Will you manage to tame him without putting yourself in danger? Will he confide his darkest secrets...?"

AND PLEASE ADD NEW CELEBRATIONS IN NEW STYLE!! Need more realistic Gameplay. Really hope that you guys fix all small bugs soon. I'll rate 5 Stars!! ❤👏👏

Everything is good. But one thing. I have 6 created players in my team and I don't get new players for 5-6 season. Please make a "Create a Player" option under 'My Club' menu with more player editing options with a base rating of 60 or 70. Please add this feature then only I can create players same as the local leage in my region. It'd be so nice if you add that.

Look what I experienced. Dls needs development. The commentry needs more reasonableness and intelligence. The behaviour of each player, at least the famous ones should be unique. Controls need more improvement. Add real team logos for the opponent teams. Update players team data according to the recent transfers. And one more issue, while playing local multiplayer we need an extra device to connect two phones. This is a bad experience. If we can connect with each other simply by connecting wifi and hotspot of the two phones respectively, it would be great and simple.

It is a brilliant game absolutely loved it. But it cud add something first can it have every player's data like if i bought neymar then can it in records give his number of goals, assists, appearances and second after every player's stats that his pitch map how many interception he did and etc not just motm bur every player

comments: For a mobile rpg (free at that) it has a lot to offer and lots to do. Lot of grinding but very addictive and you don't need to pay to win! You can attain everything through grinding without having to spend any money at all.. 5 stars for sure.. It's my new time killer.

This is one the best RPG phone games out. It is addictive and fun with lots to do at everyone point in the game. At the moment it is my favourite phone game. It is a bit complicated at the start, however you start to understand it more and more as you play. There is in game purchases but these are not necessary to enjoy the game. Definitely a 5* game! Only thing I find slightly annoying is that I never seem to have enough gold but this might change as I level up.

I recently switched to mobile gaming only, and I have a g stylo phone and a Nvidia shield k1 tablet. On my phone I get network error (I'm data only) and my tablet says the game isn't compatible. It's marshmallow OS on the shield tablet and the thing can run borderlands 2 natively so I know it's not a hardware issue. This game looks cool. Wish I could find out for sure. And no, I'm not running a speed test.

Requires some patience but is a really fun game. Don't expect to fly through the tutorial but they make it fun learning the steps. What I enjoy the most, is its NOT lagging down my processor with ads. Only thing I wish is that the home base was a little more organized.

The features of the game are cool.. i like all the pvp dungeons.. but most of the dungeons with event goes in certain time and limited.. if i miss them..then i hardly get the purpose of installing this game meaning.. nothing else to do.. it's getting boring for player like me who wants to spend hours online but no more rewarding pvp dungeons available overnight.. maybe create some entertaining 24 hours pvp features? I can tell many players tend to be inactive for more than 1 day...so hope for more crowded and better LOD..

Love the game, would give 5 stars, but lost 2 high-level characters and quite a bit of $ due to lack of anything resembling customer service. If you have to reinstall for any reason, and can't remember your password, be prepared to lose all progress because if you can't sign in right the first time, there's no way to sign out, or to contact someone to help recover your character.

comments: UPDATE: The ads are much fewer than before and, from what I can tell don't show mid level anymore.  Previous Review: I understand having a few ads and banners before or after a level, but when you're trying to dig and an ad pops up, it is way too much. Otherwise it's a fun game, but you won't get past the ads for too long without uninstalling likely.

Won't let me continue playing unless I pay, connect fb and bug friends, or I watch 3 videos,1 video every 24 hrs. So now I either wait 2 days to play or I deleted this. So disappointed. Was enjoying it.

I thought this was a kids game so why do I have to pay money, connect to Facebook, or wait 3 days to move forward!? This game is for young kids right? So do you think a little 7 year old has money or Facebook, and everyone know the are not pacent!
It kept crashing right once I click on the first level. It doesn't work at all. Don't install this app, it is terrible.
Very good but I have given it one star because it's my wish... I can give it how many stars I  want      Just joking... it's good... I will 4 star it later
It's a great game. It can sometimes be a bit challenging but I like giving things a go. I give it  a  ten out of ten
description: Get ready to join Swampy, Allie, and Cranky on their NEXT exciting adventure! The sequel to the most addicting physics-based puzzler from Disney has finally arrived. Where’s My Water? 2 launches with three brand new locations including the Sewer, the Soap Factory, the Beach. Best of all, the puzzles are all free! Cut through dirt, and guide fresh water, purple water, and steam to help Swampy and his friends! Key Features:• Play 100+ levels and challenges with a brand new look in the Gator universe featuring Swampy, Allie, Cranky, and Mystery Duck!• Introducing ‘Challenge Modes’ to replay the levels in explosive new ways! • Dig as fast as you can and get as many duckies as possible in ‘Duck Rush’ levels!• ‘Tri-ducking’ is now faster, better and more fun with boosts, such as Vacuum, Dropper, and Absorber! Small fees may be required for these additional boosts.• Connect through Facebook and see if you can beat your pals on the adventure!• Experience fun mechanics that are uniquely designed for each character!• Complete achievements and earn special themed duckies such as gladiator-duckie, astronaut-duckie, hula-duckie, and many more!• Stuck on a level? Use hints to help you solve the puzzles!Where’s My Water? is a multiple Game of the Year award-winning puzzle game. The Where's My... franchise has received hundreds of millions of downloads to date. Check out Where’s My Mickey? and Where's My Perry? for more refreshing water-physics fun!Visit Facebook.com/DisneyMobileGames for cool game tips, news and more!Before you download this app, please consider that this app includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. You may choose to control targeted advertising within our applications by using your mobile device settings (for example, by re-setting your device’s advertising identifier and/or opting out of interest based ads). • In-app purchases that cost real money• The option to accept push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content• Location-based services• Advertising for some third parties, including the option to watch ads for rewards• As well as advertising for The Walt Disney Family of CompaniesThis app accesses your contact information to enable you to easily communicate with your contacts.You can upload and save content from this app to your device.Visit the official Where's My Water? 2 website – http://games.disney.com/wheres-my-water-2-appPrivacy Policy - https://disneyprivacycenter.com Children’s Privacy Policy - https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/Terms of Use - https://disneytermsofuse.comFor additional information about our practices in the United States and Latin America regarding children’s personal information, please read our Children’s Privacy Policy at https://disneyprivacycenter.com/kids-privacy-policy/english/

Get ready to join Swampy, Allie, and Cranky on their NEXT exciting adventure!

The sequel to the most addicting physics-based puzzler from Disney has finally arrived. Where’s My Water? 2 launches with three brand new locations including the Sewer, the Soap Factory, the Beach. Best of all, the puzzles are all free! Cut through dirt, and guide fresh water, purple water, and steam to help Swampy and his friends!

Key Features:
• Play 100+ levels and challenges with a brand new look in the Gator universe featuring Swampy, Allie, Cranky, and Mystery Duck!
• Introducing ‘Challenge Modes’ to replay the levels in explosive new ways!
• Dig as fast as you can and get as many duckies as possible in ‘Duck Rush’ levels!
• ‘Tri-ducking’ is now faster, better and more fun with boosts, such as Vacuum, Dropper, and Absorber! Small fees may be required for these additional boosts.
• Connect through Facebook and see if you can beat your pals on the adventure!
• Experience fun mechanics that are uniquely designed for each character!
• Complete achievements and earn special themed duckies such as gladiator-duckie, astronaut-duckie, hula-duckie, and many more!
• Stuck on a level? Use hints to help you solve the puzzles!

Where’s My Water? is a multiple Game of the Year award-winning puzzle game. The Where's My... franchise has received hundreds of millions of downloads to date. Check out Where’s My Mickey? and Where's My Perry? for more refreshing water-physics fun!

comments: Should be an option to lock targeting  and then fire, many shots were messed up from lifting my fingure at a very slight angle.  Also check points should last longer than once. Making one mistake at lvl 190+ and then having to go back to zero was so frustrating it was the main reason i uninstalled.  Terrible shame honestly, the game could have been really fun and is an original idea

Good simple nd great stress buster but at higher levels there is glitch. I got to lvl 570+ and game hangs  and way too slow . Even number on cell exceeds its size.  I scored in advanced part. Hope developers do something about it

This has been my fav gameeee I swear this game you will love, and fun with.Its so easy to play, in the first time I play, i got of a score of, 131 how cool is thattt!!!. I cant even image what the new score would be in the future. I swear DOWNLOAD this game u wont regrett!!!!💕

Its a really great game and I really recommend it! The only problems I had was the controls are a little weird and there a little bit of too much ads but I dont mind it but I'd rather you fix it! Thanks for making me happy! ♡
Really good game to sit and relax but would be good if the balls could go faster than 2x speed. If you have high points then it takes a while for every turn to watch them bounce around.

Great game, great time burner. Absolute !@#$ with the choice of skins for your balls, it doesn't let you view them and clicking on it instantly buys it. I've been lucky with the two I've bought but still an awful design.

comments: I AM OBSESSED!!! This game is awesome, I love shooting things that deserve to be shot!!! The only problem is that you need to be a certain level to buy something and how there's only boots and helmets, and no chest plates or leggings, but when I first played it I was shocked to find 2 problems in an amazing app! 5 stars everything! Also, you should make huge, amazing looking, almost impossible bosses that will make me flip my table when I can't beat them! Keep making more awesome games!

Loved this game!!! It is my new favorite game I love all the powerful weapons and armor. I wish there was chestplates instead of amulets and leggings instead of bracelets and an easier way to find out what your hero level, But else then that it was perfect. I loved how you can choose the controls to your own preference. Chame on anyone who gave it a less then 5 Star review. I still dont know ho to tell what your hero level was but still my favorite game.

I'm really loving this game it's simple but still a ton of fun. My one complaint would be the sometimes the grind is too long and I almost gave up... I wish the developers would throw in some kind of experience boost in the store instead of just being able to buy coins. I would pay real money for an exp boost and would love to support the Developers! just give me the chance!

I understand that people want their games to be entartaining. But i dont understand why there is a thing that downgrades your item upon trying to upgrade it. I have soent the last 3 hours trying to upgrade my helm to lvl 15. Guess where it is now, On goddamn lvl 11. I have spent less time grinding mounts in wow than getting my gear to lvl 15. Stupidest thing ever. One tip. Play the campagin lvls to lvl 40. Then dont do campagin at all and run hell for gold and xp. Repeqt to lvl 80 and then get rekt by the stupid item upgrade system.

This game would be perfect if the controls were better. They are nonsense. Doesn't always shoot when I tap, jumping is crazy, and the game gives you multiple ways to control, but they are all garbage. Also would have appreciated a tutorial so I knew what I was doing

I really like the game. But there's one thing that annoys me: when I don't play this game for a few hours and then I do another battle in dungeon, the game crashes after killing last monster in that battle.  I found out that if I switch on mobile data it works. So I wanted to asked why is that. EDIT: now all works just fine. 5 stars

descriptionHTML:
Stickman? Yes, Stickman! Excellent cannons and mountains of monsters, through which you will have to break through to achieve the cherished goal! In general, this is an ordinary RPG, but how is it done! uhh, already captures the spirit. Well, maybe not the first time, but you can not sleep at night until you pass it and you do not know what at the end of this trip on interesting lands and locations. By the way, there is no plot in the game, but it will appear if you can play long enough! In any case, which of us does not like to shoot and douse a dozen evil creatures? The game has 60 levels or so. And to pass them you need to sweat. The explosions, shooting, guns. You can also find spinners and gyro-paceters, which are likely to become invincible. description: Start your engines and get ready to shoot and pop all the electric bubbles until you clear the screen. Solve the fun puzzles and challenges to level up and advance along the silver map. Download for free from Google Play and join the electric factory fun with bubble shooter. Pop bubbles and explore over hundreds awesome levels filled with seriously amazing boosts, power-ups and features.- Make 7 shots in a row to earn a fireball that will burn up bubbles on the way.- Drop 10 bubbles or more and get a bomb that will take out surrounding bubbles.Cool FeaturesAddictive gameplay. Play and enjoy hours of endless fun. Hundreds of incredible levels packed with fun puzzles and challenges. Bubble swap is free, simply tap on your bubble to change its colorAwesome graphics and effectsPlaying our game is easy, just follow these instructions: Drag your finger to move the laser aiming and lift it to shoot bubbles. You have to match at least 3 bubbles of the same color or more to pop the group and win points. Aim and pop bubbles to win levels. Remember: the fewer shots you use to complete a level, the higher score you’ll get and the chance to earn 3 stars on every level. So warm up your fingers and start working on those matching skills.

Now’s your chance to become a dolphin trainer! With more than 20 million downloads, My Dolphin Show is loved by dolphin fans all over the world! They will rate your levels and help you climb to the top of the leaderboard. Of course you can just play other players’ levels too – choose from over half a million levels that already have been created!

Collect coins as you swim and dive in the pool, and use them to buy new stuff. Have you ever seen a dolphin dressed as a princess, or a cheerleader? How about a fairy, or a bride? There are tons of gorgeous outfits you can choose from to make your new dolphin BFF look fabulous. You can even pick new animals and characters, such as an orca, shark, mermaid, or even a unicorn! With more than 40 options to choose from, you’ll have endless fun!

comments: Really good feature, free roam. But it needs an in-game chat feature because drag racing is a bit hard to do without it. Could add a global leaderboard for it as well but I'm in no rush for it to be asked immediately, but now with the multiplayer added, it's almost as good as Gran Turismo PSP. Nothing short of authentic real racing. Could add some more classics like the Toyota 2000GT and Nissan 280Z. A must-have game for real car enthusiasts. Another request is the addition of a real racetrack like Suzuka GP circuit and the Nürburgring Nordshleife circuit, the Nürburgring circuit is about 21 km long but that circuit in this game will make it totally unique compared to other driving sims that don't have it.

MOST AWESOMEST GAME EVER!!!💯 The One thing the Game Had to do was Bring in the MULTIPLAYER MODE to make it Awesome.. & Yess!! They Did it. You will never Find an Awesome & Realistic Game as this in the Whole "Play Store".!!!!!  This Game is Built for Brilliance, with Real Copyrights from all the Manufacturers.   The Custom Lobby too is Brilliant.. as the Server is more Stabble, just Needs a Bit of Tunings for the Low Graded Smartphone (Due to Lags)  But Overall a Great Concept..!! If Your Still Reading this Review & Haven't yet Installed the Game, then Stop Reading this Already!!!! GO DOWNLOAD THE GAME.!!  IF YOU WANT TO KNOW OTHER AR PLAYERS AROUND THE WORLD, THEN YOU CAN ALSO JOIN INTO THE FACEBOOK GROUP CALLED AS ★ Assoluto Racing - Drift Club ★

Best car physics I've found on android. In the single-player modes I've tried it runs smoothly on my old Nexus 2012 KitKat tablet. But there's a graphics bug: the asphalt of race tracks (but not city streets) shows as a perfect mirror image of the sky above, clouds and all! I can make rubber marks on it, though.[Edit - New version 1.20.2 hangs during startup]

Gold Standard racing sim on Android. Period. Brilliant and logical gameplay. IAP's are abundant however unnecessary to successfully progress. Huge replay value. Top end graphics without breaking the CPU/GPU bank - butter smooth framerates, accurate physics model and gorgeous UI lend themselves to a racing experience that will NOT disappoint drivers.  Multiplayer support is solid and highly functional.  Have I mentioned the most important part? The cars - huge selection and growing with every update. Top Tier Developer.

Are there rewards when you play multiplayer races? It keeps lagging when I finish online races and it just wouldn't continue, it just freezes there, please fix it. Overall this game is great but this multiplayer thing is really annoying, I've played more than 10 online races already and only got a reward ONCE....
Very slow progress and there is a track that's impossible because the finish line doesn't work. Don't download this game unless you like buggy games with a lot of grinding/in app purchases.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the factory business, where you can gain maximum profits on the backs of your hard-working employees!

Oh... I meant congratulations! You are now a factory owner! It's time to Make More!

• 💰 Manage - Hire, fire & train your workforce to maximize profits
• 🏭 Expand - Build and upgrade factories and make crazy new products
• 🎁 Boost progress - Frequent Surprise Gifts increase productivity
• 💢 Events - Boss rage, workers quitting etc. bring variety to factory life
• 🏆 Achieve - Get the trophies and finish tasks to make the BIG BOSS happy
• 🤡 Collect - Hire silly workers like Mr. Master and Splurf. Can you spot the pop culture references?
• ⭐Prestige - Restart with better workers & bonuses

Make More is one of the most loved clicker games. It is a crazy work simulator that makes YOU work to get your factories to run and to make idle profits.

Every factory you build has its own different character. Circus Factory makes sweet cakes and lollipops! Farm Factory produces farm stuff like cows. And poop.

Surprise gift boxes will boost your productivity: You'll make a fortune a lot faster when the boss gets his cup of coffee! And see your workers go wild with some motivational disco music! There is only one direction to follow: MAKE MORE!

You can play Make More! for free, but it contains optional in-app purchases. Please see your device's settings if you want to disable in-app purchases completely.

!!Warning!! HIGHLY ADDICTIVE CONTENT! Once you start playing Make More!, you can't put it away!

We'd appreciate if you'd report any issues you're having with the game to support@fingersoft.net, please include your device make and model.

description: Get in the car and start your lessons in the most realistic city driving simulator. This game will test your driving skills and it will need your full attention to traffic rules. You have to watch for traffic and pedestrians, stop signs, traffic lights, speed and much more. If you are looking for a real driving experience, Driving School 3D is the game for you.You will learn how to drive a manual transmission vehicles or stick to the classic automatic gearbox. You can pick a simulation in a large open city, country town and open highway. After passing individual levels, you will enter the final exam. On each map and level you will collect points and unlock many different vehicles. In addition to career driving mode, you can also compete with your friends by inviting them to online challenges.UNIQUE SPORT CARSIf you drive carefully and without mistakes, you collect points and unlock different vehicles such as sport sedan or racing car.REALISTIC TRAFFICCity streets can sometimes have heavy traffic so you will have to watch for other vehicles and pedestrians. Driving on a highway can be even more difficult if you are fast so be careful.ONLINE CHALLENGEChallenge your friends in online mode. You drive on a selected map and you have to obey the rules. This way you collect points and when you both arrive to the target parking lot, the better driver wins.GAME FEATURES+ multiplayer mode to race with players around the world+ sport and SUV vehicles to unlock+ more than 50 levels on 3 maps+ smooth car handling and realistic physics+ manual transmission with clutch+ switch cameras on vehicle
descriptionHTML:
Get in the car and start your lessons in the most realistic city driving simulator. This game will test your driving skills and it will need your full attention to traffic rules. You have to watch for traffic and pedestrians, stop signs, traffic lights, speed and much more. If you are looking for a real driving experience, Driving School 3D is the game for you.

You will learn how to drive a manual transmission vehicles or stick to the classic automatic gearbox. You can pick a simulation in a large open city, country town and open highway. After passing individual levels, you will enter the final exam. On each map and level you will collect points and unlock many different vehicles. In addition to career driving mode, you can also compete with your friends by inviting them to online challenges.

UNIQUE SPORT CARS
If you drive carefully and without mistakes, you collect points and unlock different vehicles such as sport sedan or racing car.

REALISTIC TRAFFIC
City streets can sometimes have heavy traffic so you will have to watch for other vehicles and pedestrians. Driving on a highway can be even more difficult if you are fast so be careful.

ONLINE CHALLENGE
Challenge your friends in online mode. You drive on a selected map and you have to obey the rules. This way you collect points and when you both arrive to the target parking lot, the better driver wins.

GAME FEATURES
+ multiplayer mode to race with players around the world
+ sport and SUV vehicles to unlock
+ more than 50 levels on 3 maps
+ smooth car handling and realistic physics
+ manual transmission with clutch
+ switch cameras on vehicle
developerAddress: Zarovnica, Croatia
summary: How fast can you get a driver's licence?
title: Driving School 3D
