comments: I'm really enjoying this game - it's surprisingly advanced for an app. Plays very smoothly and looks pretty. One annoying thing is I get network connection bugs from time to time flashing up. They don't stop me from playing tho, so meh. Also, the way they match players together is sometimes pretty suss, ships that wipe you out in two seconds flat...or less... just shouldn't be matched with you. But, overall pretty great.

One of the first games where there is a decent balance between paid and free gamers in gameplay. Amazing game. Just touched Level 50 and got rewarded an Aventador for free. Now to continue blowing up ships. Oh yeah great graphics too. A few more maps could help. Also you should be able to invite your friends. And I sold my super-heavy cannons but a fix would be appreciated.

Help! In game issue, I have a "superheavy cruise cannon" in my inventory and it looks as though my "Arbiter" ship has a special slot for that type of weapon but when I click the slot my cannon is not there! Instead it shows up when I click the slot for regular turrets, any help is appreciated. Username:RoyalStickman, amazing game will put rating back to 5star after

Was loving the game but now ships show that they're dead and yet they can still attack and he can't Target them. Fix this and I'll put it back in 5 stars. Also haven't been getting my daily log in or my league position award. Starting to think the developers don't care

Epic, got a graphic projector pointing at my screen can't see that well, good game needs more event types, more depth,details in looks customisations  and clans. Non combat ships for trade missons two teams two ships A-B either protect your ship or attack the other. Was going buy the captain kit but it evolved to quick? Does it come back

This is an all out fun and enjoyable game that if you like the idea of space battles and ships you can get different equipment for and upgrade aswell as diffrent level ships it is the one for you however it will REALLY help if you buy the starter pack it made all the difference for me. The ONLY problem i have is with loseing alot of exp and money due to adverts wich restart the game after you have 10 kills or shared.

descriptionHTML:
Space beta testing:
Please be aware that the game is still in development and does not represent a final version. This is a beta release. Please take this into account when leaving comments and ratings.
The game is not complete, and many aspects of it remain to be completed and polished in the future. We ask you to keep this in mind with your comments and ratings. We’re working hard on Planet Commander Online so you can enjoy it!

About:
Have you always dreamed of spaceships and space combat space battles? Check out the first mobile online game with direct control of your own spaceship and space travel.

In Planet Commander manticore, you are the captain of a galaxy spaceship. You start with a small spaceship, but as your pilot character grows and develops, you will end up commanding huge battleships and super-heavy spaceships. Battle galaxy on fire online with real opponents in the multiplayer space wars game mode and develop your space fleet.

The galaxy on fire and space need a commander like you! Become a legend in a galaxy on fire! Let the spaceship battles begin!

Planet Commander’s online space battles features:
- 5 spacecraft interstellar spaceships classes (from light to super-heavy vehicles: frigates, destroyers, battleships, carriers, super heavy warships), each can carry a variety of equipment.
- More than 20 spaceships to choose from, entering combat with different tactics.
- Each space battleship can be fully customized and improved: Planet Commander features over 100 different armaments and modules. You can even add your own logo and repaint your ship!
- Eve online dreadnought spaceships ""like"" gameplay
- Beautiful homeworld locations: enter battles aboard spacecraft with your squad in space as well as within planetary atmospheres and space exploration!
- Awesome space game mobile 3D graphics!

Join Planet Commander’s game space battle community!

https://www.facebook.com/planetcommander/

comments: Good timekiller. BUT as always... You have to pay up for the cool stuff... If you're going for F2P, you only get the basic stuff... And well it's getting really boring after some time. After some good hours it get's really repetitive... Right know it feels like nobody takes care about rhis game anymore. No more patches, updates, no new stuff. It's a shame. This game has some potential but it's getting wasted here.

Very Relaxing! Just watching the acid mix with water, then the black hole making it disappear is sooo satisfying! Definitely recommended! But the stuff you pay for.. Its kinda dumb. Like, pay for this and this and not satisfied, yeah, just get rid of that. <3

What a wonderful little way to give your boredom a time out. Developer, great job for what I read as a cool way to give back to the world freely! I have wondered if more pictures are an upcoming addition...? Back to my sand box! 😃

I'm kinda unhappy with this game just a little because you have to pay for the premium stuff and ther isn't much to do without it and I don't wanna pay for it, is there a way for me to get it free like downloading more of your games?! I really do like this game but like I said I might not have it that long because there is not much to do on it I need the premium stuff! Thank you for the hard work on this game but it is not enough to satisfy me fully, anyway let me know what's up!...
I LOVED IT IT IS AWESOME I LOVE HOW U CAN MAKE THINGS EXPLODE, but... i dont know why we have to PAY for the AWESOME stuff!! Am not giving 5 stars untill it gets free or at least cheaper! 😎

I absolutely love this game! I especially love the candle wick,  petrol, wax, fire work powder, plant! But the sawdust, methane and pretty much everything is amazing! The no adds is so cool - thank you. And the in app purchase is fine. It is only one dollar, anyway. Even more in app purchases would be fine so long as they wouldn't cost more than like three dollars! This game is worth so much more than $1!!! If you'd add things like humans, wolves, cows, bears, just basically animals! More materials. You shald make it so you can have more and less space as well as backgrounds! Physics like gravity and being able to shake things. Like shaking the camera will shake the things in your space like rotate. Make it like birds and humans build things or something. It would also be cool if you can change the sprouts materials that it spews!  I have no complaints! Please keep updating. I'd seriously pay $30 on the game if you add more materials and life forms and creatures that do there own unique things and interact with each other or something else awesome! Seriously thanks for making one of the best games I've ever played and keep updating please!  Thank you from Aran s. Ziegler, New Zealand, 14

comments: Wish there was more energy or like an easier way to get more energy. I get 450 energy for the day with the initial 300 and playing the mini game which gives 100 and watching the adds which is 50. But it's not enough I feel like I only get about a couple sentences in and then I run out. Maybe if you could play the mini game every hour or two to get the 100 energy and watch the ads around the same time to get 150 instead of waiting 24 hrs it would be better. The story progresses too slowly with that little amount.

This game really addictive!! The only problem is they don't give you enough energy.😒you either have to buy energy or play a mini game to get more energy. The highest energy points that you can get is 100. Plus the 30 points if you watch a video. Other than that the game is AMAZING. The graphics are realistic. It has a lot of romance too. You should definitely download this game if you're not bothered about the energy points.

Would of given 5 stars if it wasnt for the 300 energies as it doesnt go very far, would be better if it refilled twice a day instead of once. Why do you have to spend money on special scenes they should be unlocked if you picked the right choices not pay for them. Apart from that love the story and the graphics are great if these issues could be sorted that would be great

I m so excited to unveil what happens next, the energy drains hell too quick. I would love if the energy is increased to a lot more because that is effecting the gameplay and annoys me a lot personally. Leaving this issue, the game is fantastic. I have always loved choice games and this current gameplay is the best of all experiences . I wish to read more through your stories..... ❤

The game has me hooked. I'm big on reading so I fly through the 300 energies. I've spent $10 repeatedly, even $20 for energy and it feels like it was gone in the same amount of time as the 300 energies. If you allowed maybe 4 refills a day, it would be amazing, or some other way, maybe to just keep playing the minigame. There has to be something more other than 20 energies for a video once a day. But despite the lack of energy, this game has me so disgustingly hooked. I love it so much.

I think this game is really good. I just have one problem. Even though it says my energy is full, it feels like I have nothing. And also the mini game 100 energy seems to last longer than the initial 300 you receive. If you could fix this taht would be great. And if it's designed like this can you make energy spending more efficient?

comments: Amazing game. Me and my friend spend hours on it. I get to shows him my mods. He has none though we both have completed the levels. The game NEVER AND I REPEAT NEVER gets boring. Definitely better than the angry birds series must download. The only problome is the metal flap things don't work correctly. They just float in midair.Apart from that  Please make a new selection of levels. My life depends on it!!!!

Great game but el porkado is broken I can barley ever get any crates, they are in levels that are literally impossible to complete, fix now also the king pig system is garbage. I accidentally piled up about 100 of each cake and then spent about an hour dragging my finger hundreds of times. Power ups are too rare. There should just be a feed all button or something, can I please improve the king pig system

I don't  understand why people complain about ads and call Rovio money hungry. If may be a "free" game but really nothing is completely free. Developers deserve to get paid. It costs to have a game. Free games have ads just like TV. And you don't have to make the in-app purchase. GO buy a game.

I would give it a higher rating, but on those levels like 6-18. The button activated doors and platforms don't work right and they glitch out. I've been able to get through a few levels without the doors but on 6-18 you can't complete the level without this door working. Please get this fixed

Very disappointed that I've had no response to my email and that there is no sign of a fix to the bug with El Porkado, rendering the levels uncompletable. Wouldn't be so bad if you didn't have some of my actual money!

Since the crazy contraptions update, some El porkado levels and some sandbox stages have been unplayable. The flip switchs in El porkado are broken. And the spring coils tend to stretch to far or break very easily. the glue power-up does not glue perfectly anymore. Can you please fix these
description: From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGRCreate the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!Features:● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!● Free updates!● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!Mechanic Pig● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!● All you have to do is pilot it!● Tweak his design to get all three stars!New Episode: The Road to El PorkadoEmbark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!Get ready to see pigs fly!Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:http://facebook.com/badpiggiesFollow us on Twitter:http://twitter.com/badpiggiesTerms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eulaPrivacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacyImportant Message for ParentsThis game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.
descriptionHTML:
From the creators of Angry Birds: a game from the PIGS’ point of view! OiNk! Build makeshift contraptions from a huge collection of parts and make it to the goal without blowing your vehicle to pieces!

IGN's "Best Mobile Game of 2012" Winner!

"Extremely fun and very challenging" -- Kotaku

“The best title Rovio has released yet” - IGN

“4/4 - Must Have” -- Slide to Play

"If you can’t enjoy watching a pig drive a badly constructed car off a cliff and onto a pile of dynamite, you probably don’t have a soul." - Yahoo/BGR

Create the ultimate flying/crawling/rolling/spinning/crashing device and pilot the pigs safely to the eggs!

The Bad Piggies are after the eggs again -- but as usual, nothing is going according to plan! Can you create the ultimate flying machine and steer them safely to their destination? Those tricky pigs have a few objects they can use, but they need your help to turn these into the perfect transportation!

With more than 200 levels, and free updates coming up, you have hours and hours of pig-crashing, exploding, and flying fun! Get three stars to unlock over 40 more levels! HINT: Sometimes you need to play the level several times to achieve all the objectives -- try building a new device or steering in a different way to earn all the stars!

Features:
● Over 200 levels crammed with flying/driving/crashing fun!
● 40+ special levels unlocked by getting three stars!
● Free updates!
● 9+ sandbox levels to stretch your creativity!
● Ultra-special, ultra-secret, ultra-difficult sandbox level to unlock by collecting ten skulls! Oh – guess it’s not a secret anymore...
● 42 objects to create the ultimate machine: motors, wings, fans, bottle rockets, umbrellas, balloons, and much more!

Mechanic Pig
● Need help? This little piggy will build it for you!
● Mechanic pig pre-assembles transport for you!
● All you have to do is pilot it!
● Tweak his design to get all three stars!

New Episode: The Road to El Porkado
Embark on an archaeological adventure in an all new episode full of treacherously icy environments and spooky dark caves. Be sure to equip the trusty lamp to find your way in the darkness – or put the new Night Vision Goggles power-up to use!

Get ready to see pigs fly!

Become a fan of Bad Piggies on Facebook:
http://facebook.com/badpiggies

Follow us on Twitter:
http://twitter.com/badpiggies

Terms of Use: http://www.rovio.com/eula
Privacy Policy: http://www.rovio.com/privacy


Important Message for Parents

This game may include:
- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.
- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse any web page.
- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from select partners.
- The option to make in-app purchases. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand.

Keilaranta 7,
FI-02150 ESPOO

comments: Most puzzles are self explanatory. The odd few appeared to be impossible without some instruction. Few levels I had to skip probably around 7 levels. Couple due to pieces not moving or stuck. Very happy to be able to skip levels.  Would have been great to have a certain bank of hints for some of the  difficult ones. I found the later levels easier than the ones around 100. Max levels 120. Great fun!

Some things are hidden in such a place makes it hard on note 8 due to curved screen. Level 89 doesn't work, as well as other levels where touching the same place over and over and over might get something to work.  Most puzzles are extremely easy,  it's just a matter of the game not working.

Maybe it's just my phone, Galaxy S7, but even when i knew what to do i had to tap over and over again to get a response. Seriously, tap the object 10 times and nothing happens then tap it an eleventh time and it reacts. Very frustrating. Spent most of my time just repeatedly tapping the object. Game is a good concept, but really bad controls.
Fun and challenging for awhile, but I found most of the levels after 50 impossible to figure out without a cheat sheet. Got frustrating. I'm at level 60 and about ready to throw in the towel.
I'm stuck! I must be around level#50 to 70 and the loading process is froze up.  Can't even get to the main menu, two days now. I've liked Challenge 1&2, but, HELP!

Some levels are straight forward. Others you just have to skip because there's no logic or something is missing. Could be good with some type of help if you get stuck rather than just skipping an entire level.

comments: I played this a while back and decided to come back and see if anything had changed and it sure did. There have been several updates that I love (the new maps, new sharks, equipment, etc.) and I'm glad I'm playing it now. In game currency price for items has been balanced out which I love and the missions system is much better now. I would highly recommend this game to anyone who likes progression-based time-killing games like Hungry Shark World.

This game is amazing! Everyone needs to play this. I would've given a fifth star however you need to not only buy all XXL sharks to unlock the "!!" Sharks but max them out. Definitely download this, just one tip. Don't delete when you have progress. I've downloaded, played, got bored, and deleted 3 times. Now I'm never deleting it. I have so much progress, if I never deleted it the first time I would have everything in the game

Finally! For the the longest time I've been waited, the gaming performance has been improved! No more annoying lag and the gameplay feel a lot smoother now and I am so happy about it. But the graphics still needs to be improved because it doesn't look too good and some minor bug needs to be fixed.

Favourite Shark game in the entire world. I became obsessed because it's so addictive and fun. The graphics are amazing, disappointed when I got my new phone I lost my progress even when I used the smart transfer to transfer the app. I've had to start all over again... but the fun continues!

Do not upgrade your Sharks.  The bigger the shark, the more difficult it is to play.  Big sharks have more drain on health and hunger, causing you to die more frequently. Impassable areas due to size of !! shark and less fishes to eat when health gets low.  Not to mention how slow these big sharks move!  The more you spend on bigger sharks, the less fun you'll have.

This game is really addictive and i love it but i own everything now so I don't play anymore. I occasionally get on just to check for new stuff and they do put out new stuff but it takes a long, loooonggggg time. Please put new sharks out and don't make us wait foreverrrr!

descriptionHTML:
*** Hungry Shark World Selected in Google Play’s Best Games of 2016 collection ***
The Sharks are back in the bigger and badder sequel to Hungry Shark Evolution!
Control a shark in a feeding frenzy and eat your way through many oceans feasting on everything from bite-size fish and birds to tasty whales and unwitting humans!
***This game is only compatible with devices running on Android 4.2 or above***

MORE THAN 20 SHARK SPECIES
Choose from a range of sharks in 7 different size tiers, including the most iconic ocean predator: the Great White!

HUGE OPEN WORLDS
Explore the lush Pacific Islands, frozen Arctic Ocean, exotic Arabian Sea, and now the South China Sea, a vibrant urban destination full of fresh, unwary victims!

FEAST FOR YOUR EYES
Experience the feeding frenzy in stunning console quality 3D graphics that will blow everything else out of the water!

SURVIVAL OF THE HUNGRIEST
It’s eat or be eaten in waters packed with 100s of delicious and dangerous creatures… Whales, submarines and wandering locals BEWARE!

SMASHING SHARK SWAG
Level up your shark and equip jawsome gadgets to bite harder, swim faster and grow even hungrier! No shark is complete without headphones, umbrella and a freakin' jetpack!

MANIC MISSIONS & BADASS BOSSES
Take on more than 20 different types of mission including high score challenges, prey hunts and epic boss fights!

HELPFUL PREDATORY PETS
Baby sharks, whales, an octopus, and even a bald eagle are happy to help with special abilities to increase health, score and more!

SUPERSIZED MEAL DEAL
Unleash your shark's predator potential: SuperSize mode, rushes, explosion, hypnosis and more!

INTUITIVE TILT CONTROLS
Back by popular demand, now you can control your shark simply by tilting your phone!

Google Play Leaderboards and Achievements enabled.
Use Facebook to synchronise your progress across your GP devices.
Hungry Shark World is regularly updated with new features, content and challenges to keep you coming back for more!
This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gems and Gold currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Gold can also be collected in game without requiring purchases.
This game contains advertising. Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

comments: I DONT LIKE THE UPDATE THAT GIVES YOU MORE TIME AFTER FORCE OF CARDS . IT ALLOWS PEOPLE WAYY!!!!! TO MUCH TIME TO COMPLETE THE BOARD. AND IT WAS MORE COMPETETIVE B4. I DONT WANT MY RANKING TO SUFFER BECAUSE OF LUCK.  +Ima a REAL RISK FAN. I have purchased everymap package available. Its fair priced and affordable.The new maps are too easy in my opinion. MAKE MORE MAPS I'LL PAY idc jus MAKE them MORE Challenging

One token per six hours? So you as a content provider only want me to experience three games a day? That is backwards... Do away with the tokens. You will have users clamoring to purchase the DLC if they can play nonstop. This means that you would have zero reason to charge for the premium game. Anyone who has already paid for the premium gets all future DLC for free and the rest of us would be willing to purchase it. This is a great game that could provide substantial income on well placed future DLC and franchise games.

Time and time again a attacking army with 22 troops defeats a defending army of 22 troops and only losses 4 when the defending army is ment to have the upper hand . Also the game is full of cheaters with two profiles in one game so you cant win. Don't waste your money and time this game is dead there are less and less real players left. They dont care about cheaters just money.

The algorithm used to determine rolls / battles is horrible.  After less than 200 games, I have lost over 20k troops, while destroying only 16k.  That amounts to nothing more than a piss poor design.  Unfortunately I paid for this app, so I am stuck with it.   Game definitely isnt worth the price paid.  Don't make the same mistake I made.

This game is great but it could be so much better.   1. The expert AI is too easy to beat. Risk players normally gang up on an opponent, if they are dominating. There should be a legendary option.  2. It would be nice to have a match summary and timeline at the end of a game.    3. There should be an auto-save game feature when playing against the AI, in case the game drops out.  Edit: They seem to have addressed my third point.

Very unfair, questionable dice rolls against computers, obviously rigged so that on single player you can never win, and then online it pits you against people who are expert when you're a beginner so you can clearly never win. Very rigged, fun when you get the chance to play which is once every 12 hours due to them asking you to buy the premium version. Highly unfair

description: The Mills board game by LITE Games: play the popular game Mill with online multiplayer options for free on Android devices. Mills is a hugely popular game throughout the world, characterized by the fact it is so easy to learn – and it’s even older than chess. Nowadays the game that's also well known as Nine Men's Morris, The Mill Game, or Cowboy Checkers is a national pastime in many countries. The aim of the game is to hit as many enemy stones as possible by forming so-called Mills (3 stones in a row). However, you can also block your opponent by cleverly moving your own stones around, rendering them unable to make a move.If you think that you're a master of strategy: try to win against the strongest players of the LITE Games community. 😉Features◎ Completely free and in English 🇺🇸 🇬🇧◎ Unlock amazing achievements 🏆◎ Climb to the top of the online highscore leaderboard 🔝◎ 👤 Single player and multiplayer 👥◎ Can be played online and offline 🆚◎ Customizable rules to suit your individual needs ☑️The mobile Mills board game is offered in high quality localization in the following languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Swedish, Turkish, Russian, Polish, Mandarin Chinese and Japanese.Mills is a real classic travel game and offers a strategic challenge for beginners as well as experienced veterans.Join in and get yourself a top spot in the Mills player community https://www.facebook.com/LiteGamesThe 10 best players will be proudly displayed each week on https://www.lite.games/games/millsClick here to find out about our other free Android games: http://www.lite.gamesOr give us your App feedback heresupport@lite.gamesThanks for playing!
descriptionHTML:
The Mills board game by LITE Games: play the popular game Mill with online multiplayer options for free on Android devices.

Mills is a hugely popular game throughout the world, characterized by the fact it is so easy to learn – and it’s even older than chess. Nowadays the game that's also well known as Nine Men's Morris, The Mill Game, or Cowboy Checkers is a national pastime in many countries.

The aim of the game is to hit as many enemy stones as possible by forming so-called Mills (3 stones in a row). However, you can also block your opponent by cleverly moving your own stones around, rendering them unable to make a move.

If you think that you're a master of strategy: try to win against the strongest players of the LITE Games community. 😉

Features

◎ Completely free and in English 🇺🇸 🇬🇧

◎ Unlock amazing achievements 🏆

◎ Climb to the top of the online highscore leaderboard 🔝

◎ 👤 Single player and multiplayer 👥

◎ Can be played online and offline 🆚

◎ Customizable rules to suit your individual needs ☑️

The mobile Mills board game is offered in high quality localization in the following languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Swedish, Turkish, Russian, Polish, Mandarin Chinese and Japanese.

Mills is a real classic travel game and offers a strategic challenge for beginners as well as experienced veterans.

Join in and get yourself a top spot in the Mills player community https://www.facebook.com/LiteGames

The 10 best players will be proudly displayed each week on https://www.lite.games/games/mills

Click here to find out about our other free Android games:
http://www.lite.games

Or give us your App feedback here
support@lite.games

Thanks for playing!

comments: I really dislike how limited you are on steering. More than once I've found myself crashing because I had no animal to jump to and I had no room on my phone to steer properly. I would like to see something like a virtual left and right joystick, or a rework so that instead of holding to stay on (which I understand, you are made to HOLD onto the animal), a tap based system would be a good solution I think. Start the game with a start button, tap to let go, tap to lasso. This would enable the player to move their steering finger freely without worry of accidentally letting go of the animal. Just my opinion though. Despite that I really enjoy the game so far

I bought the mission mule, and it gave me nothing. I even got a confirmation email from Google play. I thought it was just because he's a mule, and I am in the savannah, but I still had to watch a video to get missions. So 1 star. Will rate 5 if I get my unlimited missions  EDIT: The team at yodo1 got back to me in 24 hours, and helped me understand what was up with the mission mule.  Amazing game. Everyone I tell about it, gets addicted to it.

I played the game for a while, and it's pretty good. I only have one issue with the game, and that is the turning. I'd prefer a slider for turning insted of turning based off of how much you slid your thumb. If you do implement that make it an option don't take out what's already there. I'll give it a 4/5. I would give it a 4.5/5, but can't.

This game was played by my sister, than I wanted to play it as soon as I saw it, cause of its amazing graphics. Now that I'm playing it, I just had to rate it. But I had to wait but I never ever preset the never show me again because I knew I was going to rate it some day. And I guess that was today. Love you created a of rodeo staped! And the people who play it too!!❤

Great game, good fun. Please move the pay to continue button from where you hold your finger because I hit it every single time I die so I lose all my money. Also the screen doesnt slide fast enough so sometimes you cannot escape rocks.

Love this game It's very Addicting. I don't want to say to much because I'm still trying to figure it out. **update**  I understand how to play it better now. I want you to know I don't really play much In the way of games anymore but a friend showed me this game and now I'm addicted to it. Also wanted to mention that I'm 49 years old so in saying that this game is for the young and old alike.
description: Saddle up and get ready to wrassle with the stampede-iest critters this side of the Savannah. Lions and Tigers and Bears are no match for this rodeo star. Armed with a lasso and a ten gallon hat, swing from the backs of stampeding buffalo, elephants, ostrich and more. Hold tight atop these bucking beasts and you might just win their hearts. When the stampede’s over, the zoo begins! Fill enclosures with your four-footed friends and let your patrons gaze in wonder. description: Blue, pink, yellow, white, oh my! Cotton Candy comes in many different colors and flavors, and now’s your chance to make your very own whenever you want. Pick your favorite color. Choose a tasty flavor. Mix and match them all! There are tons of options to try, so let’s get to cooking! In Cotton Candy Maker, grab your sugar and bring your favorite flavors to create an awesome dessert. The machine is ready and warming up; all it needs is you! This sweet treat is so easy to make that you’ll be a professional in no time. Add your sugar, pick your flavor, and spin those ingredients to fluff it up! You can even decorate your cotton candy creation to make a sweet, sweet treat that looks good and tastes good, too. Don’t forget to take a bite when you’re done! It’s melt-in-your-mouth good!  Product Features: - Easy to use controls for all ages: tap and swipe! - Simple cooking game that’s fun to master. - Tons of ways to customize your dessert. - Fun colors and flavors! - Adorable decorations to top it off! - Tons of ways to mix and match! - Hours of cooking fun! comments: Honestly, the game started out being really fun. As players increased their skill level other players (such as myself) who aren't as skilled simply become "cannon fodder". My suggestion is have several skill levels available for those of us who are less than skilled. Additionally, have a respawn area where you not killed before even knowing where you're at.

Definitely pay to win, and expect a huge difference at level 30, when you're placed against all the top level 70s... not that it matters a lot, when you can pay to be maxed with armor and weapon at +40 by level 30, and many are. Other than those points it's a darn fine game, and I've enjoyed many many hours on it... Edit: Game over for me. My best weapon got nerfed to the point of unusable, and with the added "skills" menu the game got way more pay to win. Uninstalling after years of fun. Way to ruin it.

New map Tunisia lags, unable to move. After last mention about lag was banned for no reason, they mentioned speed hack (think that having a high speed network is the issue). Nice work I did not brake any rules or used any third party soft. Your latest version laags very much. Fix it, as I had spend money on it.

It is good but still once you are level 30 it is much more harder. The player must play with other players with higher ranks with their weapons maximized. It just frustrates me to be killed by a level 50 player with  Fn2000+35 upgrades running around guns blazing with high level armor. But the game is still good... But a bit less enjoyable.

There are many glitches in the game like wall glitch, players can kill through the wall sometimes.  Out of 10 upgrade points only 2 times upgrade will be successful, what the developers want to acheive with this ??? Give me back my upgrade points, I have spent money in this game and dont want to waste my upgrade points like this. Updated - 3 mar 2018  After reaching lvl 30, i am forced to play with higher level players, They are having upgraded equipments and guns making it impossible to defeat them. Fix this Issue or I have to search for some other online FPS game Updated - 4 Mar 2018 - Finally after no reply from developers i have quit this game as I am now forced to play against higher level players , literally this game is all about money.

Graphics are average, gameplay is good until you reach level 28. Then it's a complete pay-to-play game. No matter how good you are, you will be trampled by amateurs who've spent a couple hundred on upgrades, guns, armor, etc.   After level 30, matchmaking will put you in battle with people 20 to 30 levels higher, it's despicable.  You can't last 2 seconds exchanging fire with someone after level 28, you've no chance unless you spend a ton of cash.  Way too many bugs as well, hackers can get in very easily, shoot you through walls miles away, become invincible, etc.   Overall, until you even it out, it's one of the worst games out there. Completely unfair gameplay.  Customer service is the worst in the app store. No feedback whatsoever. Game rarely loads. Will not update.

comments: It would be better if there were more tile choices, besides the basic 3. What really annoys me is that if you pause for a few seconds to look up or think of a move, an ad pops up. A 30 second, non skipable ad. The ads are also there after you finish every match. I know you need to make revenue but jeez. Calm down.
Would be a great game to pass time if there werent an ad every 5 seconds. Seriously an ad when you click on options? Thats just greedy and stupid. Id give this less than a star if i could

Like the game BUT WAY TO MAMY ADS. No game needs this many ads, I can't do anything without an ad popping up. It is really getting on my last nerves, ecut down the amount I don't mind a few but not that many.

The amount of ads is ridiculous! Especially from that "Tune Blast", it's really annoying. And, w/some of the ads you have to wait 30sec before they're done, there's no "x" button. The actual mahjong game itself is decent.
Overall, I love the game. The only thing wrong is that there's too many ads! I can't even go from menu to menu without an ad popping up. It's very irritating.

I've always loved this gamed.  I wished I could be able before I die to learn how to play the way I see them playing in the movies, the correct way. Not the way we play on cell phones and tablets. I would just lost LUV to play with the tiles, to feel them in my hand etc

description: Bei diesem Spiel handelt es sich um ein Strategie- und Aufbauspiel, dessen Hauptthema das Sammeln und Entwickeln von Monstern ist. Die Monster, die sich in dieser wundersamen Welt tummeln, verfügen über einen individuellen Entwicklungsweg. Außerdem können Spieler ihren Monstern Flügel und Reittiere zur Verfügung stellen. Besonders spannend wird es, wenn sich Spieler im Zweikampf messen. Doch neben dem Wettbewerb gibt es auch Kooperation! Verbünde dich mit deinen Freunden und gründet gemeinsam eine Arena! Dann könnt ihr zusammen gegen den Welt-Boss in die Schlacht ziehen! Dich erwartet das volle Spielvergnügen!

comments: This is my favorite game on my phone. I only got it for something else on a different game, but it turned out that I loved it. It is a really fun game and the controls and stuff are easy. The only thing I don't like is that when you shoot sometimes in attacker defender, the other person jumps up and blocks the ball when it's already almost to the net. Please fix this. Overall though, it is a great game.

The new update attempts to force you to buy gold bricks I'm order to unlock your gift bags. This may force me to delete the game as it's annoying when your winning multiple games . They could at least adjust the price of the gold bricks. Use to be one of my favorite games and I am not one to play to many games .

Good game. Balanced controls. Thanks to the developers 😀. However the game shows constant network connectivity issues. Even though I use a very high speed wifi and data it still kicks me out for bad connection which leads to losing the game. Pls Fix this guy's. Apart from that an awesome game. Thumps up to the developers

The game play and concept are awesome but the only thing I dislike is getting paired up with someone who's lvl 90 (I'm only lvl 23). This means I'm matched up with someone with superior skills, balls and agility than I am..... which pretty much means I know I'm gonna lose. I don't mind losing but it kinda sucks when the favor is tilted in the other players favor straight away. I just did a $100.000 game and guess what? My opponent was lvl 90......

I think it's a good game and it had an awesome foundation up until the latest update. I am completely and utterly dissatisfied with the newest update. What happened, Mini Clip =(  Now it just feels like I'm waiting to play instead of playing. I'm alright with change just not coping Clash of Clans terrible waiting system, for prizes I won...

I shoot it perfect and it counts it as 2 points all the time, and when I'm playing for a million dollars my opponent gets two blue balls on fire and I dont even get one!! Makes this game not fun at all, and what happened to multiplayer with your friends? I deleted this game because it simply isn't fair and seems pretty rigged, hope you guys update some of these problems.

comments: Very good! I've seen it often on the play store, and I don't know why I haven't downloaded it sooner. Very funny, cartoonish style, cool masks, good, challenging game play, and, most awesome, no pesky energy meters for rounds! It's awesome. You don't need to wait for anything to recharge before you can play again! My only issue is with the sniper controls. It controls well, but can he jerky, making it hard to aim. A tilt-to-aim feature may make this easier. But overall, amazing work!

Don't get me wrong, this game is great, its fun, addictive and all around a 5 star, but I gave it only 1 because even if my internet connection is perfectly stable, I still crash mid-game because of "connection issues". And its not only once or twice, I've had days where I am hours upon hours trying to play, but I can't, sometimes I even crash before the game itself has started, so that's why I only gave it 1 star.

This game is a game I can proudly say I will never delete. I hadn't played this game for very long but I have loved it so much. The game is incredibly fast paced so you can play up to about 4 games in 10 minutes. It's never boring and always keeps you on your toes. Both sides are fun. (I feel the sniper needs a buff but this is just my opinion). Other than that small compliant  I love this game.

It was very fun testing the early access! And the thing that i noticed was the new token system. Im not saying the token system was bad, but i liked the older system better. On how there were bronze, silver, and gold stars, and the star depended how good the item was. I was wondering why you changed it. благодаря!

A bit battery draining and overheating issues. High ping can cause for untimely deaths but a very fun game nevertheless. 10 second ads don't count toward the "speed up" for opening cases. It just says "you need to watch the entire video for timer to decrease". Also, lots of sniper aim-bots recently. Needs proper anticheats.

It's really fun, has some great mechanics that aren't very common among mobile games, and it is simple to play. But there is one problem I have, which takes place as theif. Sometimes, as I am about to duck down behind cover, there is a short time frame where the sniper is able to hit you even though you are behind the cover. This is for the full covers, not the breakable or the half. They can also sometimes hit you when you are at the full covers, which I hate. The only time I get mad when I die in this game is when the sniper is able to shoot me while I am in full cover or within that short time frame.

description: An amazing infinite blocky open world to build, craft and explore. Exploration Craft lets you be the reality crafting god! As a miner and adventurer, you need to build constructions out of textured cubes in this 3D block world. You may also need to combat against evil monsters in the evening using the weapons mined and crafted in the daylight. Explore, mine resources, craft tools and weapons, grow plants, raise you own mounts and cast magic spells. There are no limits to your creativity and imagination in this lite and pro version of the game!Game Features:- Deep tutorial and tons of 3D elements- Procedurally generated open world sandbox environment- Create your own castles using blocks and other elements- Train and raise mobs/mounts to help you fight against monsters

comments: Was an awesome game Very addictive game! Was well done.. until the update. Needs more pens and new themes as I have thousands of coins but nothing left to unlock. Bugs: Pineapples that give you coins don't register as pineapple hits for the counters. There's a glitch where the fruit jumps to the opposite side of the screen. Graphics bite the big one though.. fix it

Addictive  I play this game everyday when I wake up. I find it flawless, I have had no problems with this game, not even adds! The only thing I dislike is the title ( it did not effect my rate), why is it only pineapple pen? What happens to apple pen and PPAP? Anyway I love the modes and pens ( the surfboard is my fav pen) one again they are flawless. I think that Ketchapp is pure genius.

Its good but nobody is changing the theme. Back to normal. Its still christmas. It seems like an abandoned game yet i think it was pretty popular among non ketchapp game players. If ur not going to keep up with the changing theme at least put it back to regular n take it off holiday.

Fun and addictive but... Very fun and addictive game except for the fact that it takes approximately 60.56 MB... an app this small (but still amazing) shouldnt consume that much of my space. Unless you have more items in the games files which will be soon added, but if its not that than Im... puzzled.

BEST GAME EVER!!! (one of the best games ever) it doesn't have any adds which is great! Love all the different types of pineapples & apples. What's bad about this game? Nothing. Which is good especially for me because I'm not that patient. I would recommend that you should have this game.

How can I say this? I can not stop playing this!! Everytime I set a new and higher record I want to achieve and I only stop until I get there xD atm with 6400 coins and everything unlocked 😁😁 please release new content for months and months!! It will make me so happy! Thank you for this game.

description: Run Ninja Fun Run is the best endless running game! Come on to challenge your friends and breakthrough their records in this game.Welcome to explore this endless running world! Here you will run with the loveliest Ninja rabbit in forest. Speed up to surpass other rivals to be the fastest runner!It is a wonderful forest adventure but it is not easy to complete the task. You need to jump over faults, dodge traps and keep away from dragons, elephants and tigers as well as those sweet elves with carts. Collect energy bottles during the way to help you run farther!If you are able to catch a dragon as mount, you will be unstoppable for a while. The most fun in game is to run after robbers and take back your gold.Be confident to face with all the obstacles! Run as far as you can to be the winner!Unlock new scenes to experience different running style! Collect more gold to build your home in dream!Are you ready to start this wonderful running adventure?Features:Fantastic running scenesRun as far as you canComfortable sound effectFun of building unique homeland
descriptionHTML:
Run Ninja Fun Run is the best endless running game! Come on to challenge your friends and breakthrough their records in this game.
Welcome to explore this endless running world! Here you will run with the loveliest Ninja rabbit in forest. Speed up to surpass other rivals to be the fastest runner!
It is a wonderful forest adventure but it is not easy to complete the task. You need to jump over faults, dodge traps and keep away from dragons, elephants and tigers as well as those sweet elves with carts. Collect energy bottles during the way to help you run farther!
If you are able to catch a dragon as mount, you will be unstoppable for a while. The most fun in game is to run after robbers and take back your gold.
Be confident to face with all the obstacles! Run as far as you can to be the winner!
Unlock new scenes to experience different running style! Collect more gold to build your home in dream!
Are you ready to start this wonderful running adventure?

Features:
Fantastic running scenes
Run as far as you can
Comfortable sound effect
Fun of building unique homeland
recentChanges: Run as far as you can
summary: Join us in this running adventure to collect gold and build your homeland!
title: Run Talking Ninja Run!

(No Hate) It is actually that you should click maybe after the third or fourth turn to get it right... Even I took time to understand that So it's okay 😊

This is by far my favourite mobile game to date. Loads of fun and not covered with ads like every other game out there (while there is a few this one isn't as bad). My only complaint is the new continuation thing. That wasn't there but now it's forced me to watch ads even though I played to remove ads.

I originally had it as 5 stars, but I noticed the longer that I've had the game, the more bugs I'm starting to see. Sometimes the music won't line up with the levels, which is the point of the game, and other times the game won't register my touch and will screw up my progress. If this gets fixed that would be great, and I'd move the rating back to 5 stars!

I really wish you guys didn't update it. It truthfully bugs me that I can't listen to the full song on the menu anymore. The songs are absolutely amazing and the game is very addictive. I hope you will update the game again so that we can just sit and listen to these master pieces if we wanted. Thanks for an awesome game!

Featuring different worlds of increasing difficulty, each one paints a unique picture and evokes different emotions. The key is to not only watch for obstacles and traps, but also play to the music. comments: This game is great! Though there are things I would change about the new race mode and some things in arcade mode. For example, instead of having to pay a dollar USD to cut the rope tire, why not pay a thousand coins to get rid of it for the next 5 or 10 times it needs to show up, and have us pay the dollar to get rid of it for good. And in arcade, if you accidentally missed your reward,why not have it double the next reward rather then keep the amount the same all the time, otherwise, I wouldn't change a thing besides those two things, I love it ^^
The climbing game is the only thing I hate, it's such BS. My knife will slide and hit a branch after it went into the wood. That's not supposed to happen. But overall great game.

Not perfect but it's really good, hate the tires though, not willing to pay any amount of money to remove them. It would be better if after 1-5 thousand score on race, the tire would be removed or maybe throw a knife 10 times through the tire and it would be gone. Kinda silly to pay to  remove something that would make for much better gameplay if the player could play the game and earn it gone. (Mostly doing this for the 500 coins but this is an honest review)

Great visuals, smooth physics, and addicting Gameplay. Great game, my only thing I'd change would be the end-game knives, past 10k all the knives kinda suck, and have awful 'flipability', making it pointless to save up for anything above 10-15k. If you added a better variety of knives into the game this would be a 5 star.
Its a good game. It can be frustrating though at times when the knife lands perfect but it doesnt count it. And at times the flip and fall are not accurate. But overall i really good game
You can thank Rusty Cage on YouTube. Also it shuts off ever few minutes and I don't know why

description: Play a variety of quirky mini-games in Frantics™ on PlayStation®4 with this Frantics™ Companion App.Challenge your friends and family in everything from crazy arena brawls to wacky races for up to four players. Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware – he’s helping them too!It’s easy to join in – just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. You may even find that the Fox calls you for secret missions...Make sure your PS4™ console is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.Use this app to:•	Choose an animal to play as and shake your device to randomize it.•	Snap a selfie to show who’s who in the game.•	Play nice or sabotage other players in mini-games using your own screen. •	Receive texts and calls from the Fox to help you win.This application can be used in the following languages:English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Mexican Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.PlayLink for PS4™ titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. playstation.com/playlinkforps4This app turns your device into a controller. PS4™ console, Frantics™ and the Frantics™ Companion App are required to play. PS4™ console and Frantics™ are sold separately.The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use of this app, depending on your country of residence:playstation.com/legal/software-usage-terms/
descriptionHTML:
Play a variety of quirky mini-games in Frantics™ on PlayStation®4 with this Frantics™ Companion App.

Challenge your friends and family in everything from crazy arena brawls to wacky races for up to four players. Your charmingly unfair fox host will help you sabotage your rivals, but beware – he’s helping them too!

It’s easy to join in – just use your smartphone or tablet as a controller to shake, tilt, swipe and snap. You may even find that the Fox calls you for secret missions...

Make sure your PS4™ console is connected to the same Wi-Fi network as your device and then you're ready to go. Simply follow the in-app instructions to connect.

Use this app to:
• Choose an animal to play as and shake your device to randomize it.
• Snap a selfie to show who’s who in the game.
• Play nice or sabotage other players in mini-games using your own screen.
• Receive texts and calls from the Fox to help you win.

This application can be used in the following languages:
English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Greek, Czech, Hungarian, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Finnish, Mexican Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese.

PlayLink for PS4™ titles are all about social gaming that everyone can enjoy. Pop a game into your PS4™, pick up your smartphone or tablet, gather around your TV and prepare for a refreshingly different experience – without the need for multiple DUALSHOCK®4 wireless controllers. playstation.com/playlinkforps4

This app turns your device into a controller. PS4™ console, Frantics™ and the Frantics™ Companion App are required to play. PS4™ console and Frantics™ are sold separately.

The following Terms of Use and Privacy Policy apply to the use of this app, depending on your country of residence:
playstation.com/legal/software-usage-terms/

descriptionHTML:
Der Toggolino CLUB – über 55 Spiele für Kinder ab 3 Jahren! Seit mehr als 10 Jahren bietet der Toggolino CLUB Kinderspiele und Lernspiele für Kleinkinder und Vorschulkinder.

- Spiele mit den Toggolino Lieblingen wie Bob der Baumeister, Caillou, Benjamin Blümchen, Thomas und seinen Freunden, den Oktonauten und vielen mehr.
- Wissen aus dem Alltag wird spielerisch vermittelt: Zahlen, Tiere, Farben, Formen, Buchstaben, die Uhr, Verkehrserziehung und weitere Themen.
- Regelmäßige Erweiterung der Kinder App durch neue Spiele.
- Alle Kinderspiele sind voll vertont, intuitiv und ohne Lesekenntnisse spielbar.
- Elternbereich mit Spielzeiteinstellungen, Spiele-Suche und Spielerprofilen.
- Im Offline Modus können alle heruntergeladenen Spiele für Kinder auch ohne Internetverbindung genutzt werden.

So funktioniert die Toggolino CLUB App:

Sie sind bereits Toggolino CLUB Kunde?
Dann installieren Sie sich die kostenlose Toggolino CLUB-App, loggen Sie sich mit Ihrer E-Mail und Ihrem Passwort ein und schon haben Sie und Ihr Kind Zugriff auf alle Spiele.

Sie sind noch kein Toggolino CLUB Kunde?
Für die Nutzung des Toggolino CLUB ist der Abschluss eines Abonnements notwendig. Weitere Infos dazu finden Sie auf http://www.toggolino.de/einfach-anmelden

Ihr Tablet/Smartphone wird unterstützt, wenn es mit dem Google Android Betriebssystem ab Version 4.4 arbeitet. Es werden keine Android-Geräte mit einem Intel-Prozessor unterstützt!

Bei Problemen mit der App senden Sie bitte eine E-Mail an: info@toggolino.de
developer: RTL DISNEY Fernsehen GmbH & Co. KG

description: Children's doctor - we all love when people around us smile. We become well and happy when someone on the street gives us a smile. But for a smile to be beautiful, you need to take good care of your teeth. This applies to your pets, because in childhood they were for every kid. Like people, they also sometimes need to treat their teeth. This can be done by a special doctor - dentist. We present to your attention an exciting game for children - a dentist (vet clinic). In this entertaining game, your child is a real dentist, under the guidance of which there is a hospital for animals. The kid is entrusted with a very important and responsible task - the treatment of teeth of his four-footed pups, whose teeth began to ache heavily because of their love for sweets. You have to treat them in a real dental office, use various medical instruments, such as tongs, scalpels, Burmashin and many others, to clean your four-legged friends of teeth from plaque, align them, do operations, remove cavities and fill them. descriptionHTML:
Children's doctor - we all love when people around us smile. We become well and happy when someone on the street gives us a smile. But for a smile to be beautiful, you need to take good care of your teeth. This applies to your pets, because in childhood they were for every kid. Like people, they also sometimes need to treat their teeth. This can be done by a special doctor - dentist. 
We present to your attention an exciting game for children - a dentist (vet clinic). 
In this entertaining game, your child is a real dentist, under the guidance of which there is a hospital for animals. The kid is entrusted with a very important and responsible task - the treatment of teeth of his four-footed pups, whose teeth began to ache heavily because of their love for sweets.
 
You have to treat them in a real dental office, use various medical instruments, such as tongs, scalpels, Burmashin and many others, to clean your four-legged friends of teeth from plaque, align them, do operations, remove cavities and fill them. After all, they all just need your help. For her, the animals will be grateful to you and very grateful.
 
Developing games for children, such as a veterinarian, contribute to the overall development of your child. They help to develop fine motor skills, coordination of movements, visual perception, attentiveness and observation, will show the baby how to treat animals, take care of them.
 
Our games for kids, such as a dentist, will teach them not only to treat their pets with love and care, but also to protect their own teeth, do not forget to clean them several times a day, because going to the dentist is not the most pleasant pastime.
 
For the purpose of comprehensive development of the child, we create applications and educational games for children that are aimed to help boys and girls develop basic motor and other skills, and also have fun, fun and useful to spend their free time.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome to the MultiCraft ― world of unlimited opportunities! The real Adventures are waiting for YOU here!
Built and destroy blocks! Extract Resources and different Stuff that will help you easier to survive!
Choose your side in this world – a Builder (mode Creative) or a Ruthless Hunter, who will do everything to survive (mode Survival)!

► Be careful, in this world not only peaceful Animals, but an awful Monsters too! Win a battle with them and you will get priceless resources!
► Swim across the seas for new lands and resources – lands are unlimited. Exploration their!
► If you decided to survive – keep eye on hunger and fill out it in time! Search for food, grow plants and kill mobs for meat!
► Built your shelter from the monsters and you will survive this night! They are coming for you… Zombies, Skeletons, Huge Spiders and other hostile mobs.
► At any time you can fly to the skies with the mode “flight” or become fast as flash with the mode “acceleration”. But remember, it will take your time!
In this game your actions are unlimited only by your imagination! With MultiCraft you can spend good time everywhere and every minute! And it’s totally FREE!
Do you want to play with your friends? Create your own server (Local Server) or join one of the servers of Minetest. In the nearest future we plan to launch a large number of the non-stop servers of MultiCraft.

In this game they are waiting for you:
⇒ Huge Spiders;
⇒ Insidious Skeletons;
⇒ Strong Zombies and other hostile mobs;
⇒ Red ore and mechanisms;
⇒ A realistic game process;
⇒ Cows, pigs, sheep and other peaceful mobs;
⇒ Hens lay eggs;
⇒ Stable FPS and drawing card without lag;
⇒ High game optimization and the generation of the world for all modern devices;
⇒ A lot of different biomes and the unique topography;
⇒ Incredibly easy operation;
⇒ Completely revised for easy management of the game;
⇒ Single player;
⇒ Multiplayer mode and accelerated flight.

This is an original MultiCraft Open Source Project Open Source, licensed under LGPLv3. License and source code can be found on this site. Before using any part of the project MultiCraft You must fully read the license (attached to the source code).

--- --- ---

description: In der App können Kinder in die liebevoll gestaltete Schnipselwelt eintauchen. Gemeinsam mit Kikaninchen gehen sie auf spannende Erkundungstouren und gestalten Schnipseltiere im Bauernhof, erfinden abenteuerliche Fahrzeuge und probieren sie aus oder schauen ihre Lieblingssendungen aus dem KiKANiNCHEN Fernsehprogramm.Die App versteht sich nicht als Spiel, sondern vielmehr als vielseitiges Spielzeug und Begleiter: spielerisches Entdecken und Ausprobieren, anregende und lustige Spiele ohne Zeitdruck, kreatives Gestalten und Musizieren stehen dabei im Vordergrund. Eine App, die mit dem Kind wächst und an der das Kind wachsen kann – ohne  Werbung oder Inhalte, die Vorschulkindern Angst machen oder sie überfordern.Die KiKANiNCHEN-App ist ein Angebot für App-Einsteiger, das sich an dem Entwicklungsstand und den Bedürfnissen der jungen Medienanfänger orientiert. In enger Zusammenarbeit mit Medienpädagogen wurde das Angebot entwickelt, um Kindern einen geschützten Raum zu bieten, in dem sie ihre ersten Erfahrungen im Umgang mit Apps sammeln können. Die textfreie und kinderleichte Steuerung der App ist ideal für Vorschulkinder im Alter ab drei Jahren. Es gibt viel zu entdecken:- 3 Spiele,- 5 Mini-Spiele, - zielgruppengerechte und wechselnde Videoangebote aus dem öffentlich-rechtlichen Fernsehangebot von ARD, ZDF und KiKA,- liebevoll und abwechslungsreich gestaltete Welten: unter Wasser, im Weltall, im Wald, auf einer Schatzinsel, auf einem Piratenschiff etc. Das bietet die App:- multisensorische Steuerung über Touchen, Pusten, Klatschen, Schütteln und Singen, - sie ist kostenlos, ohne In-App-Käufe oder sonstigen Werbeangebote,- Download-Funktion von Videos zur Offline-Nutzung,- Personalisierungsmöglichkeiten,- Geburtstagsüberraschungen,- jahres- und tageszeitliche Anpassungen, - Erstellung von bis zu fünf Profilen,- kindersicherer AppWecker zur Begrenzung der Nutzungszeit,- kindersicherer Erwachsenenbereich mit diversen Einstellungsmöglichkeiten. Der (medien-)pädagogische Hintergrund: Die KiKANiNCHEN-App möchte Vorschulkinder dort abholen, wo sie sich in ihrem individuellen Entwicklungsstand befinden. Sie werden entsprechend ihrer Bedürfnisse gefördert, ohne sie dabei zu überfordern. Der Schwerpunkt der App liegt auf diesen Bereichen:  - Förderung der Kreativität durch exploratives Ausprobieren, Forschen und Gestalten,  - Spiel und Spaß ohne Überforderung und Zeitdruck, - Vermittlung von Selbstbewusstsein für das eigene Handeln,- Förderung der Medienkompetenz,- Training von Aufmerksamkeit und Konzentrationsfähigkeit.Support: KiKA möchte die KiKANiNCHEN-App auf einem hohen inhaltlichen und technischen Niveau weiterentwickeln. Feedback - Lob, Kritik, Ideen, die Meldung von Problemen – helfen dabei.Das KiKA-Team antwortet gern auf Ihre Anmerkungen über kika@kika.de. Über die Kommentare in den Stores kann dieser Support nicht geleistet werden. Über KiKA:KiKA ist ein Gemeinschaftsprogramm der ARD-Landesrundfunkanstalten und des ZDF für junge Zuschauer von drei bis 13 Jahren.Unter der Dachmarke „KiKANiNCHEN“ bietet der Kinderkanal von ARD und ZDF wochentäglich die besten Vorschulsendungen von ARD, ZDF und KiKA. Für die Drei- bis Sechs-jährigen ist „KiKANiNCHEN“ „das“ Angebot. Hier sehen sie Programme, die auf ihre Fähigkeiten und ihre Bedürfnisse abgestimmt sind: anregende und witzige Geschichten und Lieder.www.kikaninchen.de www.kika.dewww.kika.de/erwachsene

- Vermittlung von Selbstbewusstsein für das eigene Handeln,

comments: I love this game. Its and absolute tome waster and lovely to play. However, I had set my phone to the side to let it play out (as I was over 1400) and it reset on its own. I had cleared the screen the round previously so there was no chance of me losing to that. It was behind me and I never would have reset it. Is this some sort of glitch? If it is, please fix it soon. Aside from this, this is amazing.

I beat my high score, & watched the ad to get a second turn.  Great right?  Apparently not.  I always try to press the back button to get out of ads once they are over, but that didn't work.  So I pressed the 'X' in the top right corner & boom... The #&$@&#@ Play Store opens... So I went to close it... & The Play Store replaced the game!!!! So when I closed it, I closed the game... So yeah I'm pretty triggered.  I PRESSED THE 'X'!  The game itself is awesome. But now I'm triggered.  Please fix that.

If I could give zero (0) stars for controls, that would be too high. The game is fun and addictive. But there is a restart button that there is NO REASON FOR. I have lost my progress three times with scores over 1000, which takes weeks to achieve. THE DEVELOPER DOES NOT RESPOND EVER. Uninstalling.

It's good at first but you'll lose returning customers. Where are the power ups? Maybe an ultra bull that acts as 2 hits each turn. Nothing is drawing me back to and having me for higher school. In fact high score just means waiting longer. Could potentially be a great game.

Best ever! Addicted to it. Cute graphics and fun color make it great! The aim-and-fire technique makes it original! Installed it 2 days ago, top score 72 average score 50!  P.S. If you like this app (which you probably do) try Amazing Thief! Great and another Ketchapp marvel! I'm not spoiling it, but I will tell you it's a lot like Flappy Bird. If you don't know what Flappy Bird is, well then look it up.  P.P.S.  Anyone here would probably have at least SEEN Flappy Bird, but seriously. It is like an Aztec-age game.

Both my husband and I have this game.  I opted to pay for the no ads though, he did not.  DO NOT do this!  He is able to get "continues" for watching adds and can keep climbing up the levels.  I cannot since I purchased no adds.  I get to continue once and that's all since I have stopped ads from allowing me to get the extra chances.  I wish I would have known this beforehand. Otherwise, this game is seriously fun and addicting.

descriptionHTML:
Relax your brain with the champion of time killer!

Swipe your finger to throw the balls and break the bricks.
Try to break as many bricks as possible before they move down to the bottom.
Collect all the items to get additional balls and make an endless ball chain!

The level of bricks will be increased after each round you throw the balls.
Very easy to play but very hard to reach high scores. Don't forget the angle is the key point!

Game Features:
◉ Free to play
◉ Endless gameplay
◉ Simple ball control
◉ Challenge your friends with the best highscore

comments: I love Beat the Boss 4! But there are some things that I would like to be fixed. For example, when naming your custom boss, the name duplicates. The way to fix it is by putting spaces after it. Another example is that the boss customization screen sometimes switches back to boss selection screen and can't go back after being there for long periods of time. I would love to give this game 5 stars if these issues were fixed.

I loved it. I understand the ads are so that you can continue your work. However, there is a few probelms. First of all, when you click on the judgey/uneven eyes, they change to even eyes. Second of all, when you click on a custom character, the game doubles the name, and following along with that, sometimes it undoes it. I understand if it takes a long time, but i'm asking you, if you can, to please fix these when you can. Sorry for bothering you.      Doge is waiting

Too many ads. It's annoying especially when you are connected to the internet. The King Boss is not working and is always saying "Something went wrong, please try again later" and crashes the whole gane. On the other hand it's a super addictive and fun game to play.

The game is amazing, but it is pathetic at the fact that there are ads popping up every 2 minutes and there's no way to remove them... I would be happy to pay to remove the ads, I won't be playing this game until this is fixed. I remember playing this game years ago, I understand you guys may be making more money from displaying ads than people paying to remove them.

I really love this app it is so fun to play but there is a glitch that happened to me and my brother when we were playing, the friend thing didn't work and we were logged into our accounts and the loading screen was just black outlines and Joe's face. I'm pretty sure it didn't load like that before but over all, 5 stars! Have a good day/Night!

I'd happily purchase this game but that doesn't seem like an option. Tge ads, especially the LOUD BLOW UP EXPLOSIONS game that go on for 30 seconds are especially annoying. I'll gladly buy it, if only to not deal with Fing ads all the Fing time!!

comments: Pay to win: In all my years of gaming, i have never played a game more pay to win than this. If your opponent has bought the tower packs and plays carefully, there is literally nothing you can do with your tier 1 and 2 towers. The only viable strategy is to buy lots of 2:2 wizards and hope your opponent messes up, if your game is as imbalanced as this unless you pay, don't make it free to play in the first place

The only thing I do not like is how you need the vip membership to use the special modes, which I get you guys need money to keep it going but I think like one day a week there it should he free for that day or and hour or two. Keep up the good work Ninja Kiwi 😊

So the ads 30-60 secs, a very small x in the corner to close the ad when finished, in-app purchases, optional ads for extras, bad servers which disconnect frequently...  All suggesting that you pocket a lot of the money without reinvesting in the game, it's a shame since I love TD games but the ads are too much on this and it shows that you're trying almost everything to sap money out of people which takes the fun out too. Uninstalling until the ads are significantly reduced in time.

You have hackers playing this game. I just played a game against a guy who ballons kept passing all his towers but no points came out of his health. I rember why I delted this game in first place. I could have a ton of gallons go thru people's line and they not lose health.

Only fast when showing an ads 😤 and frequently unsynchronized. It made me confused because sometimes the ballon pass trough but the enemy's health bar are not decrease. And when watch the replay. Enemy has tower that not showed in real game.

I have an idea people. If you face people who are not losing a single life, have infinite money, or automatically beat you, then report them. They then can only face hackers like them. And also, I love the game. I mean, those bloons popping are soooooooo satisfying! And you should ban the hacks that are online like infinite medallions, money, or lives. Basically,  I would give this a 100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000/10.
description: Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates.Play the top-rated tower defense franchise in this all new head-to-head strategy game!Go monkey vs monkey with other players in a bloon-popping battle for victory! From the creators of best-selling Bloons TD 5, this all new Battles game is specially designed for multiplayer combat, featuring 18 custom head-to-head tracks, incredible towers and upgrades, all-new attack and defense boosts, and the ability to control bloons directly and send them charging past your opponent's defenses. Check out these awesome features! * Head-to-head two player Bloons TD * 27 custom Battles tracks * 22 awesome monkey towers, each with 8 powerful upgrades * Assault Mode - manage strong defenses and send bloons directly against your opponent * Defensive Mode - build up your income and outlast your challenger with your superior defenses* Battle Arena Mode - Put your medallions on the line in a high stakes Assault game. Winner takes all.* Card Battles Mode - Choose the perfect deck of tower and bloon cards to outwit and outplay your opponent* Monkey Tower Boost - supercharge your monkey towers to fast attack for a limited time * Bloons Boost - power up your bloons to charge your opponent in Assault mode * Create and join private matches to challenge any of your facebook friends * 16 cool achievements to claim * Customize your bloons with decals so your victory has a signature stamp If you are new to Bloons tower defense games, don't worry - a helpful tutorial walks you through the game, and matchmaking will help balance the opponents you face. And if you want to battle against your friends, you can easily create and join private matches with anyone on your Facebook friends list. descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates.

Play the top-rated tower defense franchise in this all new head-to-head strategy game!

Go monkey vs monkey with other players in a bloon-popping battle for victory! From the creators of best-selling Bloons TD 5, this all new Battles game is specially designed for multiplayer combat, featuring 18 custom head-to-head tracks, incredible towers and upgrades, all-new attack and defense boosts, and the ability to control bloons directly and send them charging past your opponent's defenses.

Check out these awesome features!
* Head-to-head two player Bloons TD
* 27 custom Battles tracks
* 22 awesome monkey towers, each with 8 powerful upgrades
* Assault Mode - manage strong defenses and send bloons directly against your opponent
* Defensive Mode - build up your income and outlast your challenger with your superior defenses
* Battle Arena Mode - Put your medallions on the line in a high stakes Assault game. Winner takes all.
* Card Battles Mode - Choose the perfect deck of tower and bloon cards to outwit and outplay your opponent
* Monkey Tower Boost - supercharge your monkey towers to fast attack for a limited time
* Bloons Boost - power up your bloons to charge your opponent in Assault mode
* Create and join private matches to challenge any of your facebook friends
* 16 cool achievements to claim
* Customize your bloons with decals so your victory has a signature stamp

If you are new to Bloons tower defense games, don't worry - a helpful tutorial walks you through the game, and matchmaking will help balance the opponents you face. And if you want to battle against your friends, you can easily create and join private matches with anyone on your Facebook friends list.

The choice of strategy is yours - hunker down for the long game, or go for the quick win with a rush of fast Bloons? Jump into a game of Bloons TD Battles now!

REQUIRES INTERNET CONNECTION

PERMISSIONS: Bloons TD Battles requests permission to access to read and write to your external storage to buffer video ads. Video ads help fund the production of our free games, so we appreciate your understanding and support. If there are ever any problems with the amount of data stored, please contact us at support@ninjakiwi.com.

YouTubers and Streamers: Ninja Kiwi is actively developing, supporting, and promoting channel creators on YouTube, Twitch, Kamcord, and Mobcrush. If you are not already working with us, keep making videos and then tell us about your channel at youtube@ninjakiwi.com.
